I visited this hotel on May 2023 and this hotel offered me one of the best stay experience I ever had! A very good hotel, with luxurious architecture and wonderful hospitality. The food was great, everything was perfect. The beach on the back of the hotel was also terrific. Sofitel Bali is truly an elite collection of Accor Group!

The reception from the staff at the hotel is great, we felt very confortable right away, check-in and check-out was very efficient. The facilities are incredible, well located in a really quiet area which i appreciate it a lot, all amenities in the suite, restaurants, pool, services were incredible, breakfast has many options, my wife and I had a blast at the Sofitel , definitely loooking forward to come back.

Breakfast had wide variety and the food was spread out hence it doesn't feel crowded although this is peak season. The lounge was pleasant - breakfast in the morning, afternoon tea from 3-5pm and evening canapes from 530-730pm. The afternoon tea came in very nice display tray. We enjoyed chilling by the swimming pool during the day and by the beach just before sunset. Tried dinner at Toya Restaurant as well by the beach - as it's peak season reservation recommendation. Thanks to Davipa from housekeeping our room was kept clean and neat with ample bottles of water. We had floating breakfast in our plunge pool - first time trying and good for Instagram.

Everything was amazing from the check in experience, facilities, food, accommodation and staff. As I the core loyalty member, we were upgraded and also enjoyed the benefits of the lounge, which was next level. Would highly recommend this resort. We will be returning for the third time next year.

Loved the great location on Nusa Dua beach front. Stayed during peak season, pool side lounge chairs were fully occupied and the pool was crowded, not as expected. Breakfast has good options but service was slow especially coffee and individual prepared noodle section. Rooms were given 3 stars as it wasn‚Äôt newly refurbished although some reviewers mentioned so, or perhaps our room category was not done yet. Overall did not enjoyed the stay as there‚Äôs too crowded.
Loved the clean beach and being comfortable to swim in the sea. The pool was great too. Could have had an extra set of steps in the smaller pool near the lounges.

Excellent hotel with all the details very well cared for. Awesome pool: clean, good temperature and the longest I know. The personnel (minus 1 case) with a well -known attention are super friendly and careful. The half pension badly give very little food and almost everything charges you an extra. We had dinner yesterday and see the photo of the dish that put a 10 -year -old girl, 3 chicken portions and a dessert is all dinner and you tell him and the toya manager (the worst professional we saw in Bali in our 15 days, it should not be from Bali or at least the karma is not from Bali) did not lend us the minimum. Erik the waiter very good attention The perfect hotel. The beach is not good

Akses bagi OJOL pengantaran makanan/food sangat menyedihkan..masih harus jalan kaki yg jauh dan buka atribut..seakan¬≤ sampah kalo ada logo gojek di dalem..titip satpam aja napa..selalu saya cancel klo dapat kesanaüëé

A fantastic stay at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua! The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, the room was clean, spacious, and had all the essentials. Great value for money with a perfect location for exploring the city. Highly recommended!

A very pleasant stay at Sofitel. The kids enjoyed the plunge pool so much! Room is clean, comfortable and overall very nice ambience. Special mention for our room attendant Mario who is very helpful and friendly, he is very attentive to our needs and always willing to give a helping hand with a smile. Adding a nice touch to make our stay even more pleasant. Thank you Mario and Sofitel team!

There is a lot to like about the Sofitel. We stayed for 10 days during July. The room was very nice and we enjoyed the tranquility of the location. If you want peace and quiet then compared to many locations the Sofitel provides this. We used the gym during our stay and found it to be very good compared to many places. The pool closes very early at 7pm we probably wouldn‚Äôt have stayed if we had realised in advance and this might be a deciding factor for some. We worked with the time of the pool closure but given there isn‚Äôt much around except your hotel this should be perhaps reconsidered by the Sofitel. Some other downsides included being refused soft drink on our free welcome drinks and being refused 2 drinks with our 2 vouchers. We were only allowed a single cocktail or alcoholic beverage from a limited menu. I complained and got told I should go and see management if I was unhappy which did make me a bit more unhappy. Obviously a training issue there and management did profusely apologise. The other was deciding to use the spa facilities and paying for the worst massage experience in at least 20 years at an extremely high cost. My mother enjoyed her massage experience.

Perfect Honeymoon Destination in Bali! My husband and I spent 12 incredible nights in the Honeymoon Suite, and everything about our stay was absolutely perfect. This resort is beautifully located, offering a serene escape from the hustle and bustle, which was exactly what we wanted for our honeymoon. The resort has plenty to offer to fill in those days when you don't want to leave the resort. Club access was totally worth it, providing great perks and service. And you absolutely *must* try the spa ‚Äì it's truly incredible! A special shout-out to our butler - Edi, who made our stay so seamless and enjoyable. He went above and beyond to ensure every detail was taken care of. We can't recommend this hotel enough for a romantic getaway or honeymoon in Bali!

Our stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua was overall okay, but there were several points that could have been improved. Check-In: The check-in experience was disappointing as we received our room later than the official check-in time. After a long journey, this was not ideal. Staff: In general, the staff was friendly and helpful. However, there were a few exceptions. The waitress at the lobby bar was very strict and not welcoming, which gave a bad first impression. Additionally, one of the female waitresses at the pool bar was extremely rude, when handing me my drink, she almost threw it into the pool, which was shocking. On the positive side, Sri really stood out; she was always smiling and eager to help, making our experience much better. Also, the male waiters at the pool were all very nice and attentive. Room: The room was modern and clean, thanks to the amazing housekeeping team, but it felt a bit too small for our taste. Facilities: The pools were beautiful, but the management should be stricter about guests reserving sunbeds and then leaving. Many sunbeds were occupied with towels but no guests in sight. Food & Drinks: The food was delicious, both at breakfast and in the restaurants, and the drinks were great too. It is also worth mentioning that the coffee was incredible. That said, we found the prices extremely high for Bali. Beach: The biggest downside was the beach. The slope into the water was quite abrupt, and the sand was muddy and unpleasant, it felt like your feet were sinking into it. Of course, this isn‚Äôt the hotel‚Äôs fault, but it‚Äôs worth mentioning for those who expect a pristine beach experience.

After a personal emergency, I received horrifying service from this hotel‚Äôs reservations team. Among other things, (1) they unilaterally cancelled my reservation without express confirmation from me that they should cancel it; (2) despite one night being on a flexible rate for which I *VOLUNTARILY* prepaid and would otherwise not have even charged for when I had to cancel my stay, they told me the prepayment for that night (together with all other nights) would be kept (despite the fact that I offered to prepay); and they offered no form of goodwill until I copied in the Accor Plus (loyalty means nothing to the Sofitel Bali) team, and even then, they didn‚Äôt reply to my various emails until the Accor Plus chased them. They then said that their goodwill gesture would be a ‚Äúspecial rate‚Äù in the future. This was meaningless given I intend never to stay at Sofitel Bali after this experience, and pales in contrast to two other comparable hotels that (a) offered to cancel without penalty and (b) to postpone my stay to the future where I paid a rate difference. There are 5* hotels and there are 5* hotels and, in Bali, there are choices. Don‚Äôt book at the Sofitel Bali if you‚Äôre expecting an empathetic or flexible reservations team. Edit: to be clear, nobody reached out to me to offer assistance. I offered to pay more for a future stay. I offered to pay an admin fee. Anything to not lose the money already paid. You guys didn‚Äôt bother and simply kept the money.

We loved our stay at the Sofitel, we were well looked after and the service was amazing, big shout out to Eddie and staff for taking care of us. Thank you Prana for your exceptional service every night at the lounge. üåü

Dari awal kedatangan sampai proses check-in, pelayanan sangat ramah. Saya juga sangat puas karena bisa early check-in di jam 1. ‚Ä¢ Kamar bersih dan luas, membuat pengalaman menginap semakin nyaman. ‚Ä¢ Untuk dinner di Cucina, rasanya menurut saya kurang garam di hampir setiap hidangan. ‚Ä¢ Saat breakfast, makanan cukup enak dan bervariasi. ‚Ä¢ Kami juga sempat berkunjung ke Kids Villa. Sayangnya, pelayanan dari staff di area ini terasa kurang ramah dan agak judes.

We recently returned from a family holiday to Bali and had the luxury of spending one night at the Sofitel Nusa Dua as part of the Accor Plus membership. From the start we were warmly welcomed to The spectacular lounge area. While our room was not ready initially (we arrive approximately 2 pm for a 3 pm check-in). The comfort of Waiting in the lounge with afternoon tea and drinks was greatly appreciated. Our upgraded room was nothing short of spectacular ‚Äì The Pool Access room was luxurious its modern appointments and access to the pool. As a family of three (2A, 1C) the room was spacious enough as we spent all of our time outside it. The resort is spacious, well maintained, clean within an inch of its life and a true place of relaxation. Whilst we didn‚Äôt get the opportunity to experience all of the facilities such as the table tennis, gym, tennis, we hope to return in the future. Highlights - staff, pools, cabanas, lounge, pool access room, breakfast juices, many breakfast options. Low lights - people vaping around the pool, breakfast buffet food was tepid in temperature unless cooked immediately for you, not having enough time to really enjoy the resort!

Amazing resort, 6 star experience, great location, right on the beach and a walking track that gives you access to restaurants and other resorts. The resort pool is the best. If in Nusa Dua stay at the Sofitel Bali Beachside Resort.

Saya orang Indonesia, pribumi. Check-in dibantu di Lounge dan service baik sekali. Di hari yang sama sambil nunggu check-in, staff di area aktifitas arah ke Toya, saya dikira mba-mba bagi brosur. Pas kamar lagi rest, ada yang bell dan coba buka pintu, itu pertama. Yang kedua, lagi rest juga dan ada yang bell kasih invitation padahal udah dikasih pas check-in. Saat breakfast, makan ga tenang karena meja yang di-assign buat saya dipake orang lain. Bolak-balik ambil makanan, meja saya dibersihin terus padahal masih ada yang saya makan/minum. Saya akhirnya keliling dengan mata rabun karena ninggalin kacamata biar ketauan ada orang di meja itu. Terakhir, book dinner buat nanti malam. Saya iseng confirm ternyata tidak terdaftar. Semoga bukan karena saya ga kelihatan fashionable ya, kaya orang ga punya uang. Untuk makanan breakfast di Kwee Zeen menurut saya oke. Gatau nih kalo dinner di Kwee Zeen. Katanya buffet, semoga ga tiba2 ala carte. Saya ga tertarik coba Cuccina karena reviewnya kurang bagus. Kalo Toya saya tertarik tapi hujan terus.

Sofitel never fail to make it feel like home. From check-in, all the way to check-out all staff were amazing. Special thanks to Tri and Amy for always making the stay wonderful. We will definitely keep on coming back.

Hotel mewah dengan akses pantai yang luar biasa! Suasana nyaman. Staf yang ramah dan informatif. Lingkungan bersih. Toilet harum dan bersih. Hotel yang bisa jadi referensi untuk momen ‚Äúsunrise‚Äù karena pantainya di arah timur. Pantainya berpasir putih. Sambutan music ala Bali rindik yang menambah suasana semakin santai.

Our favourite place to stay in Bali. Tucked away in the beautiful tranquil surroundings of the very popular Nusa Dua. Excellent location. Excellent restaurants. Excellent pool and bar with the most friendliest staff. Very clean. Offers a free shuttle bus to Bali collection. Exceptional service.
Spacious rooms, particularly with 3 adults in 1 room. Breakfast fantastic. Friendly staff. Shame the pool closes at 7pm though, but swim up bar great.

Stayed at the pool villa for our anniversary and enjoyed every minute. Staff were professional and friendly. Beach was accessible and clean. No shortage of restaurants with excellent food & beverages.

This large, professional resort offers so much, you may not want to leave! Great if you like consistent chain hotel quality. Kids' pools are a highlight, along with ground-level rooms offering direct pool access. Don't miss the pool bar. For active types, direct surfing access, bike rentals, and soccer are fantastic!

Stayed for 6 days in September 2025 for a conference. The hotel is very well located on the beach in the center of the Nusa Dua development. I have stayed in numerous hotels in the area over the years and the Sofitel has some of the best and most modern facilities. The property is well maintained and the service is wonderful. Conference, catering and social facilities are also very good.
Another great family stay at the Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua- our 5th time total. Always a fantastic experience with lovely staff, wonderful food and facilities.

Totally inflexible and poor customer service. Beware - the ‚Äòflexible‚Äô rate is not at all flexible. We had a family emergency (even offered to provide medical evidence) and informed the hotel the day before we couldn‚Äôt travel. We had booked a ‚Äòflexible‚Äô rate but the hotel still insisted on charging for the first night and forfeiting an Accor Stay Plus pass. We certainly won‚Äôt book with Accor again.
Breakfast at Sofitel Bali is excellent. The choice of food is fantastic and the staff outstanding; very attentive with great initiative to make breakfast even more pleasant.

An unforgettable 5-star experience in Nusa Dua! Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua truly lives up to its reputation as one of the best luxury resorts in Bali. From the moment we arrived, the service was warm, professional, and impeccable. The rooms are spacious, elegant, and incredibly comfortable ‚Äî we especially loved the plush Sofitel bedding and beautiful ocean views. One of the highlights of our stay was joining Club Mill√©sime ‚Äî it elevated the entire experience. The exclusive lounge access, afternoon tea, evening cocktails, and personalized service made everything feel even more luxurious and special. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a premium touch! The pool area is stunning, and the beach is just steps away with soft white sand and clear water. The breakfast buffet is one of the best we‚Äôve had, with a wide variety of delicious international and local dishes. The spa is also worth visiting ‚Äî so relaxing and beautifully designed. Perfect for couples, families, or anyone looking to unwind in style. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!
Bath towels leave lint everywhere. Staff should ask sister hotel ibis about theirs, a lint free standard. Breakfast is in French style, i.e. no air conditioning.

Our experience at the Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua was incredible. The staff went above and beyond to make sure our stay was enjoyable. Great food choices, rooms serviced daily and lots of activities for families. Our room attendant Mario was great and would check in on us a few times a day to ensure we had everything we needed. The pool area and pool bar was great for swimming up too for drinks and food. Highly recommend

One of the beautiful hotel in Nusa Dua which caters to all your needs. Thank you to all the friendly staffs esp to Oka, Thiya and Lia for making our stay so memorable and also for the surprise birthday in our room ‚ù§Ô∏è
Breakfastnya enak2, makanannya beragam dan banyak banget variasinya, pelayanannya juga oke banget terutama mba Mega sangat ramah dan helpful, recommended üëç

I visited as an Accor Platinum member. A few days before my stay, I sent an email and was kindly upgraded from a standard room to one with a plunge pool. I stayed for three nights and was satisfied with every aspect of the experience, including the breakfast, pool, and Club Mill√©sime. All the staff were friendly, and the professional service from the lounge team was especially impressive. It was such a wonderful stay that I will definitely return the next time I visit Bali.
Thank you so much for our stay! Hotel is incredible for kids and the entire family! From the food, kids club, swim up pool bar and room service (thank you asih) we loved our stay!

Sofitel Nusa Dua Resort was absolutely incredible! The buffet breakfast was easily one of the best I‚Äôve ever experienced ‚Äî endless options and presented so elegantly. Our room was stunning ‚Äî spacious, spotless, and beautifully maintained. Every single staff member was so warm and welcoming, even those just passing by would stop to say ‚Äúbonjour!‚Äù The pool area was fantastic, and the beach beds and shaded beach temples were perfect. We also had a massage on the beach which was pure bliss ‚Äî truly a 10/10 experience, one of the best massages we‚Äôve ever had. The beachfront itself was pristine and beautifully looked after. We couldn‚Äôt recommend this place more!

Service was good and the suite was rather decent, but the incessant music from the adjacent beach club ruins the entire stay and experience. Doesn't seem like there's much the management can do about it as well. If you are looking for a quiet stay, do look elsewhere as this isn't the place for it.
Lovely resort and a very pleasant stay. Breakfast could be improved, but overall great hospitality ‚Äî especially from the Club Mill√©sime team and Miss Lestari at the front desk.

I do not normally stay at resorts but enjoyed a few days here at the end of a trip to Indonesia. Staff amazing, as usual, a very comfortable Sofitel room, great location with beachfront access connecting, along a path, with other beachfront properties so a great walk or run possible early morning, along with sunrise views. Pools a bit crowded and noisy but it is a large property and school holidays. They were a bit slow removing towels after guests had left, otherwise service exceptional.

My family loved staying in Sofitel Nusa Dua. The hotel is excellent, cleanliness is awesome, staff is very friendly and willing to help. We booked breakfast and being pure vegetarian we were initially concerned if it will be worth but Indian vegetarian was a highlight apart from many other items. Shree, one of your staff in breakfast area and Indian Chef were great. Keep it up and we will come again.
Great stay at a beautiful sofitel resort in Nusa Dua. Clean rooms, lovely pool, and very friendly staff. Perfect location for relaxing and enjoying the beach. Highly recommend!

We arrived at 13.00 where the loby is pack full of guests waiting to checked in room. It was so hot. The AC didn't work. After submitting the personal info, we waited in the room which is very hot and packed of people. The lady seated us at 13.50 to fill the form and process to check in but still no room available. The lady informed that will be WA message when the room is ready. We asked to use gym or other facilities but rejected, no key room, cannot enter the gym . We sit wasted our time until 16.07 got WA information our room is ready. When we entered the room, it is already for other guest.... How can Sofitel, the premium hotel miss management during check in ? It was really a mess and wasting our time for 3 hours doing nothing in the loby. I heard the gentleman in the check in desk said over the phone : why didn't queued the room from 13.50 ? He has to apology for several time, but we already tired
Great facilities that were always clean. Set against a child-friendly beach. Great pool for the kids, however, the kids club was less engaging for my 4-year old.

The food was absolutely delicious, the service was fabulous, and everything about this place is simply charming. The view is incredible, and everything was quick and attentive. A special mention goes to our waiter Aria (A-R-I-A), whose attention and friendliness made the experience even more memorable. Highly recommended!

We had a wonderful experience at Sofitel in Nusa Dua. The rooms are spacious and beautifully decorated, featuring large, incredibly comfortable beds, air conditioning, and generous bathrooms. We stayed in a Luxury Double Room, which was lovely ‚Äî but if possible, we highly recommend choosing a room with a private or plunge pool for an even more special experience. A heartfelt thank you to Asih, who kept our room spotless and made it feel fresh and welcoming every day. The breakfast was excellent, with a wide variety of delicious options to suit every preference. The pool area is large and peaceful, with plenty of comfortable places to relax. The hotel restaurants are a bit on the expensive side, but the food is decent and the service is truly excellent. Special thanks to Bagia for helping us organize activities like bicycle rentals and badminton ‚Äî his support added a personal and friendly touch to our stay. One small suggestion would be for the hotel to be more consistent with personalized touches. Some of our friends received welcome fruit plates or small surprises in their rooms, which added a thoughtful feel ‚Äî it would have been nice to have experienced the same. Lastly, while some staff members could improve their English, their warmth, kindness, and willingness to help more than made up for it. Overall, we had a memorable and relaxing stay and would gladly return.

Kamar nya bukan yg termewah atau tercanggih yg pernha kita nginep, tapi udh oke dan homie banget. Staff cukup ramah, makanan nya enak terutama yg di club milessime nya dessert dan makanan nya enak banget. Apresiasi banget buat kokinya. Staff nya yg di concierge nama ARTANA sangat oke.. ramah banget. Sy ada bawa makanan buat di bawa ke papua untuk org tua saya dan dia sampe bantu bawa kita ke kulkas penitipan dan carikan tmpat buat makanan kita. TOP banget‚Ä¶.

We had a wonderful weeks stay enjoying amazing food, great facilities and very friendly staff. In particular Andi and his team in the Loh Bar were so lovely and friendly. The breakfasts were delicious and the staff always smiling and helpful. From arrival to departure we had a lovely time and felt we were well looked after.

Longest check in and check out process at any hotel I‚Äôve ever been to. The breakfast buffet was great, but other than that, food was bad. Location is terrible, you‚Äôre trapped in resort land. And the pool is nothing like the photos. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend unless I had a family. Not a Bali or Indonesia experience at all. Feels like Orlando, FL.
We had a wonderful food experience at Sofitel with so much choice. Alit was especially exceptional, was very attentive, kind and a big smile. Really looked after us. The food was amazing.

First family holiday for our kids was super relaxing. All the hotel staff were exceptionally warming and very welcoming and helpful with the kids. Housekeeping service was exceptional. Overall the room in good order and was adjoining which was super convenient with kids. Buffet breakfast was a worthy addition to our rooms and an amazing selection. Kids loved the kids club and couldn't wait to go back. There is really no need to leave the hotel facilities if you don't want too.

The perfect holiday destination. The location and facilities have everything you want for a relaxing holiday. Thanks to the beautiful staff for making our stay exceptional. A special shout out to Sri in Kwee zeen and Surata in the gym üôè

We supposed to check in at 15, but had to wait 2 hours in the lounge... My wife ordered a birthday cake from our vouchers, cake never arrived. Breakfast is very bad.... doesnt fit in a 5 star hotel! We will not return! I see that there are a lot fake reviews today!

We had such a pleasant stay. This resort is a perfect choice for those travelling with children, with kids club and kids pool just around the corner from the beach club. The room was cozy and the breakfast spread was excellent. We especially had a wonderful time at breakfast, and our server, Wikan, was super helpful and attentive.

Every aspect of our experience was nothing short of exceptional. From the warm hospitality of the staff, the immaculate villa, and the attentive service‚Äîeven our personal butler exceeded all expectations. The highlight of the evening was undoubtedly the wedding dinner‚Äîthe food was truly outstanding and left a lasting impression on all our guests. üëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèª Our deepest gratitude to the entire Sofitel team for their unwavering support and dedication from the very beginning. A special thank you to Miss Prilia, whose kindness and professionalism guided us through every detail with such care. ‚ù§Ô∏è

The resort itself is quite pleasant and the rooms are spacious. However, we experienced a very serious issue with the swimming pool. While swimming there as a family, all four of us suffered burns to the soles of our feet. It was extremely painful. Despite reporting this twice at the reception and showing our burns, our complaint was never properly addressed. I explained that the pool is often used by families with children and even babies, and that it is unacceptable not to have more information about this type of incident or to see any corrective action taken. The staff, although very friendly, only responded with ‚Äúthank you, sorry.‚Äù This is simply not acceptable for hotel guests, especially as the pool is apparently very dangerous due to the chemicals it contains.

A Dream Stay at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua! No doubt: one of the most beautiful hotels I‚Äôve ever stayed at! The hotel grounds are stunning, and the room was one of the most spacious I‚Äôve seen‚Äîmodern, spotless, and very well maintained. The swimming pool is beautifully designed, and the pool bar made it even more enjoyable to relax there all day (yes, I did! üòÑ). Breakfast was amazing, with a wide variety of dishes‚ÄîJapanese, Indian, Western, and of course, delicious Indonesian food. Lots of fresh pastries too! Check-in felt luxurious, and the staff were incredibly friendly and helpful throughout my stay. It‚Äôs a large resort, so expect a lot of space and options. Food at the hotel is a bit pricey, but the good news is you can walk along the beach to Bali Collection, a nearby open-air shopping and dining area with more affordable restaurants. There‚Äôs also a shuttle bus every hour if you prefer not to walk. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for more. I was looking for a cozy and relaxing escape‚Äîand this place delivered. My only regret? The stay was too short!

Absolutely stunning resort, exceptional food especially at the Italian restaurant. If I could give this place more than 5 stars I would, the room decor is gorgeous). Every spot at the resort is ‚Äúinstagram worthy‚Äù. The staff are so friendly and helpful (special mention to Wikan, thank you for looking after us every morning for breakfast!).

What a truly delightful experience it was to stay at the Sofitel Spa and Resort in Bali! From the moment we stepped in, we were welcomed with five-star service that exceeded our expectations. The environment was wonderfully family-friendly, striking the perfect balance between luxury and enjoyment. We thoroughly enjoyed relaxing with the soothing spa treatments, participating in the lovely beach activities, and having convenient access to fantastic shopping options nearby. Each day brought something fresh and memorable. The property itself is absolutely stunning‚Äîlush, well-kept grounds with breathtaking ocean views that seem like they belong on a postcard. The staff was exceptional‚Äîalways attentive, friendly, and eager to help with anything we required. Unlike many standard travel experiences, the Sofitel provided something truly remarkable: a feeling of tranquility, warmth, and authentic hospitality. We departed feeling rejuvenated, joyful, and already dreaming about our next visit .

This resort is truly a luxurious paradise, words can‚Äôt describe it. We came for our Baby-moon and stayed for 4 nights, we got a very kind upgrade from a normal room to a room with a plunge pool which was very nice. Our bed was super big and comfortable, the bathtub was nice and the shower was well equipped with L‚Äôoccitane products which felt very luxurious. The location is great, we didn‚Äôt have to leave the resort at all because we had easy access to the beach, restaurants and pool. Their breakfast is super delicious, so many endless options! Their service is amazing- anything you ask for, they will happily attend to your needs. The staff are so very kind. This is by far our favourite hotel we‚Äôve ever been at and we truly recommend it for anyone coming to Bali. We will 10000% be coming back next year!

Thank you very much to Yoga and Agus for the warm and friendly hospitality at LeBar! You guys are absolutely amazing, friendly, supportive people. I spent three nights at Sofitel, and everyone there was simply wonderful. The staff were always ready to assist anywhere in the resort, and I was greeted with smiles at every corner. It‚Äôs a place where you truly feel relaxed and comfortable. :)

Sofitel Nusa Dua is the only hotel we stay at when visiting Bali. All the staff are super lovey and especially Sri from Kweezeen breakfast. She was very helpful, polite and our baby liked her a lot. This hotel is in the perfect location, close to 7/11 and Bali Collection. Other hotels are also quite extravagant, but I especially like Sofitel because it‚Äôs not TOO big. This is helpful because you don‚Äôt have to walk too long to get to your room, pool or back to lobby.

Amazing hotel! Since the day we arrived, the reception team was very helpful and the check-in process was seamless. All the staff are extremely friendly and truly accommodating. We will definitely be back soon

The Sofitel was a beautiful hotel in a fantastic location. The Sofitel is perfect for a short stay (up to a week) and is really good value for money, especially if you are an Accor member. The food at every place we ate was sensational and the service was very good. We especially loved the beach barbecue restaurant, which had outstanding live music every night, and the happy hours occurring in the late afternoon.

WOW ! Amazing hotel. Our experience at Sofitel Bali was absolutely seamless from beginning to end. There is extremely high attention to detail from every aspect of the hotel, from layout to high end finishes to extremely attentive and professional staff that attend to your every need. I would like to thank borh Mega and Devayana Kweezeen for outstanding service. At Sofitel every customer is important and it clearly shows. If you want a holiday to remember for all the right reasons Sofitel Bali is yr destination. VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

A wonderful hotel! My daughter and I celebrated our birthdays here, and the hotel even prepared a birthday cake for us! Every request we made was accommodated perfectly. The breakfast selection was also very comprehensive. The only regret is that there is no infinity pool, and the lighting in the room is a bit too dim.

Sofitel in Bali is a dream. The check in area is great, the gym is well equipped. There‚Äôs a nice selection of drinks and food in the area, and the rooms are beautiful! Staff are friendly and the breakfast buffet selection is good too. Will be back

We have stayed at the Sofitel Nusa Dua Resort many times. We have never been disappointed. The staff are all friendly and extremely helpful - nothing is ever too much trouble. The food was great as always, especially the buffet breakfast. The hotel amenities are excellent. Our room was lovely and our attendant Asih was amazing. Nothing was ever too much trouble and our room and the service we received was excellent. We will definitely be back.

My partner and I had a chemical reaction and itchiness to the pool and it had stained our clothes that we swam in. They upgraded us to a room with a private plunge pool and even still the issues persisted. No refund was offered but a measly 100$ worth of points. The damaged caused by the pool far exceeded that $100. ruining multiple pairs swimwear, other forms of clothing and a beach bag. Totalling to north of $1500 AUD

I recently stayed at your beautiful hotel for 3 nights and 4 days, and I just wanted to say how impressed I was with the overall experience. The room service and housekeeping were truly exceptional. I‚Äôd like to give special thanks to Mario, the attendant who took care of our room. His attention to detail, kindness, and professionalism made our stay even more comfortable and memorable. Thank you for providing such a high standard of service

Stayed 6 nights in Sofitel, what a brilliant hotel. Choice any food you could think of for breakfast, the hotel and pool design is beautiful and location is right on the beach. Our room was spotless thanks to our lovely attendant Roni who also kept us well stocked up with water and left some funny and cute towel art for us (pictured) on various mornings, it was great to have the personal touch.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this hotel, and I must say, it was one of the best experiences I've had in a long time. The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, and the room was clean, comfortable, and well-appointed. The location was also perfect, with plenty of great restaurants and shops within walking distance. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

Had great experience with Sofitel.. amazing staff, good hospitality specially at BF we had Sri taking care of us everyday beautifully. Loved the overall experience also we had amazing Indian food served by Indian chef
Resor mewah tepi pantai dengan desain elegan bergaya Prancis, menawarkan fasilitas premium, layanan berstandar internasional, serta pengalaman menginap istimewa dalam suasana tenang dan eksklusif.

We had an amazing stay at the Sofitel Nusa Dua. The grounds were stunning, our room was immaculate and staff were super friendly. Notably, the service at breakfast was outstanding - Sri was wonderful, she was attentive and represented the hotel to the service it intends.

Had a wonderful time at Sofitel with family. From dining, facilities and services, all things are all perfect. The jogging path by the beach along the entire coastline and connects to several surrounding hotels. It is worth mentioning that the staff here are warm and lovely, especially the best Asri, who gave us the warmest welcome and thoughtful service all the time.

Very impressed with the room, especially the bed, very large, suitable for families with small children. The beach is very calm. Wish the children's swimming pool had more variations of slides and games. The breakfast menu is varied and delicious. The staffs are friendly. Everything is perfect.

For loyal Accor members who expect to find true 5-star VIP attention, you may wish to stay elsewhere. This Sofitel is more like an overcrowded family mega-resort, not a place for upscale adult experiences. The Club upgrade has almost no value, as the lounge is crowded and noisy with speaker phones, and children - even at cocktail hour. Public pool is large and interesting, but there were few open lounge chairs.

Excellent Hospitality and Service. Beautifully planned property, good large sized room, toilet and balcony. Very easy to merge in the green environment of the resort. Sumptious breakfast menu and great prompt service. Best wishes to management and staff of Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort

I stayed here for three nights and had a great time. The staff were all super friendly, and the room was clean and comfy. Cucina restaurant was definitely a highlight ‚Äî the food was amazing and the servers were really nice!

Overall, the resort was beautiful, the ambience and arrival experience were truly impressive. From the warm welcome upon arrival to the elegant surroundings and genuine hospitality, everything reflected the signature Sofitel charm.
Specifically the staff at Sofitel have been beyond exceptional. Sri made our breakfasts very comfortable and enjoyable and Agus in the fitness centre was incredibly generous and hospitable

We stayed here earlier this year and it was overall the best accomodation we had in Bali, we originally had issues with our driver from the airport not understanding how to get to our hotel (probably our own fault), and when we arrived we had booked an ocean view room and our room was not, this was fixed immediately and all the staff were super friendly and accomodating. The house keepers were incredible and very friendly, and all the staff gave us good recommendations for dinner, coffee, shopping, when we asked! Would 100% stay here again, although it was the most expensive hotel we stayed in, the pools, breakfast, staff, ect all made up for it, you definitely get what you pay for!

Dined at Kwee Zeen for breakfast and was served by the lovely Michelly who was super friendly and attentive. She was informative and very helpful. Loved the service and the variety of food on offer. Everyone is incredibly welcoming at Sofitel Nusa Dua. Would love to return again!
Everything was great from the moment we arrived. The room was clean and comfortable. Staff were kind and helpful. Check-in and check-out were easy. We had a nice stay and would come back again.
Really enjoy our stay, Beautiful and clean beach, nice pools, comfortable room, and excellent service. Will definitely come back again

I was very disappointed with the standard of the hotel, I would not class this as a 5 star hotel. In our room we encountered the following issues: 1) Minimal wardrobe space, nowhere near enough for a couple of 2. We had to resort to leaving piles of clothes on the sofa 2) No hot water for the bath 3) Poor water pressure in the shower 4) No full length mirror 5) Furniture is in disrepair and needs replacing 6) There is no sound proofing in any of the rooms, which means you are awoken by neighbouring rooms or people in the hallway. 7) Worst of all the rooms are all extremely damp and your belongings will get damp just by having them in the room, even with the AC on. Even around the communal parts of the hotel you can see that things are not well looked after or maintained such as loose bricks, poor finishing and general disrepair.

A group of us stayed at here recently and had a marvelous time. It‚Äôs such a beautiful resort!! The food and drinks are good. The view of the beach is soooo nice! Our attendant Guda did a great job, he was so nice.

Hotel ini memberikan pengalaman yang tak terlupakan. Suasananya mewah namun tetap hangat. Proses check-in cepat dan efisien, kamar memiliki desain elegan dengan pemandangan menakjubkan. Semua detailnya diperhatikan dengan baik, membuat saya merasa sangat dihargai sebagai tamu

We came here for our marriage anniversary. The location, was amazing and super safe thanks to high level of security. This part of Bali is totally different place than other parts of Bali. Servicing and welcoming to hotel were great. We have been welcomed by drink and a wrest band symbol of love, peace and spiritual. The pool and bar in the poil were great. The breakfast was the best on the world and actually the hotel awarded the best breakfast in the world. The room was big and designed beautifully, however, the furniture made from wood and most of them detoriated and the wood was destroyed. I found two small insect in the wooden shower curtain which probably does not clean for a long time (please clean it room 5209) The private beach and activities as well as welcome drink and fresh towel everytime you go to the pool were amazing. To me this is respect to customers. The sleep pillow selection like other Sofitel hotel were great, however, some staff are not familiar with this and even after requesting several times the staff bring the normal pillow. They should trained better. The bad thing happened was the big weeking in our hotel which the sound was very high and annoying for other customers. Also due to the weeding, the facilities and activities became limited only becasue for this weeding, which is unfair to others. The staff all of them were amazing, kind respectful and super friendly. Our romantic dinner on beach was unforgettable and we had the best time and best trip ever on our life. We hope to come back again and see the beautiful Bali with its amazing people.
Hotel is amazing and the staff are fantastic. Beautifully situated resort within tourist ITDC area. Easy walk to the local amenities including Bali Collection etc

The Sofitel Nusa Dua is a truly beautiful and magnificent resort. It‚Äôs so wonderful I can‚Äôt think of anything I would suggest to improve it. I think it‚Äôs absolutely perfect. The layout, the lush gardens, the pools, the private rooms of course, the restaurants and bars. Everything is exceptional. But what truly makes this resort so special is the really lovely staff who are always smiling and who are so willing to make your experience the very best it can be. I feel that they are very genuine and generous in their endeavour to assist you in any way. For example Diah who cleans our room. She has the most gorgeous smile every time we interact and she‚Äôs brilliant at cleaning our room. One more example of this I would love to share is the very beautiful Deva from Kwee Zeen restaurant. Not only was he excellent at his job he was so smiley and friendly and conversational with us. This made us feel so extra special and created such a wonderful dining experience. Bravo Sofitel Nusa Dua and thank you so much!

My sister and I stayed here for a few days and loved every minute of it. We were so excited to get a free upgrade when we checked in. All the staff were absolutely amazing, especially Mario our room attendant who was always friendly and always made sure our room was well stocked with water and towels. The food was delicious, we did in room dining a few times and each time loved the amazing and generous food (especially the French pastries basket) It‚Äôs in such a perfect location and it was beautiful watching the sunset on the beach. We both got a massage on the beach which was fantastic !

Everything about our stay at the Sofitel Nusa Dua was fantastic! the food was superb, the rooms were luxurious, the activities were plentiful and the ammenities were clean and modern. The main attribute that made our stay was the staff, you could tell they genuinely strived for excellence in customer service, were always friendly and very attentive. In particular Amy the Director of rooms was amazing, she took the time to get to know my wife and I, we really enjoyed chatting with her and learning about Bali, she went the extra step at all times to really make us feel special. Agus from Health and Fitness was also really great. He was so much fun to talk to and a very friendly face around the resort and when we went to the gym. We would highly recommend staying at the Sofitel and we cannot wait to go back!

I asked a baby crib for my child, and received this lovely crib complete with a small pillow and a baby blanket. It's so cute‚Äîmy child absolutely loves it. Thank you for the excellent service, Ms. Asih. We hope to see you again on our next visit to Sofitel.
This was our first time staying at Sofitel Nusa Dua. Overall, it was a good stay. The resort was nicely located in ITDC. Service was great, and the resort had excellent facilities.

What a stunning hotel. The breakfast is unbelievable Our housekeeping ‚ÄòSuta‚Äô was amazing (our favourite), he really contributed to our stay by making sure we had everything we needed. All the staff are very welcoming Thank you üôèüèΩ

Salah satu oknum security ini . Yang tidak mencerminkan sopan santun sedikitpun . Semoga security ini bisa berbenah diri . Daerah pariwisata tata bahasa yang benar dan sopan santun harus bisa dipahami oleh seorang scurity .

Nice big rooms and good pool and beach area. Club lounge had excellent afternoon tea and cocktail options but the evening canapes were very basic and pretty average. Kids enjoyed the kids club and all staff are welcoming. Restaurant options aren't the best.

User Name: Cephalexin ‚ÄúThe Bay Harbour Dr Pepper‚Äù Greenmoundgentitis
Review Text: The pool connecting to the balcony of the rooms is actually so awesome sauce. Amazing for a summer holiday when its veyr hot and humid to just jump straight into the pool from the room and easy to clean up and shower when leaving the pool instaed of having to like run to a towel area, dry off and walk through cold air con to make it back to the rooms soaked and cold. The buffet selection was also very nice and the staff working are very accomodating.

Overall we had a pleasant holiday at the Sofitel Nusa Dua. We started our stay in an ocean view room and then moved to a villla. The people who work here have been amazing; friendly, courteous, professional. The kids club was welcoming and our kids loved it. The restaurants were good - both service and cuisine wise. We should probably note that the butler service for the villa was not provided for us during our stay until our last day. There were some addition draw backs to consider. This is the loudest resort, or environment generally, I have been almost ever. There is incredibly loud music from early afternoon through to 10:30/11 every night - so loud that you can‚Äôt escape identify song lyrics while in your room trying to sleep. We found it impossible to actually relax. As an aside to the bear constant noise, the rooms need some love. During our stay there wasn‚Äôt a single room that we stayed in that something wasn‚Äôt broken - doors on cupboards falling off, pool lights not working, electrical outlets not working, drains backing up, etc. We also got gastro while eating and staying exclusively at the resort and the villa was packed full of mosquitos. Hopefully nothing more nefarious comes from that. Overall, it‚Äôs a beautiful resort but it is a bit of a contradiction. It has incredibly generous villas that are laden with mosquitos and don‚Äôt necessarily provide the service level promised. It is a serene landscape with a lovely spa, but it is also trying to be the loudest nightclub in Nusa Dua - which is ironic considering the vast majority of people here are young families or retired.
The check in process was fast and seamless and I was given an unexpected upgrade. All staff were helpful and courteous and I thoroughly enjoyed my 3 days' stay at this fabulous resort.

We stayed at Sofitel Nusa Dua for 6 nights, this is the first time we have stayed in the areas and we were very happy. The hotel was great, especially our room, the housekeeping staff were fantastic)especially Sugi who was very helpful and efficient. The only let down about the whole of the hotel was the food offering, we went to the three restaurants and both the Italian and International restaurants were very disappointing, both in quality of food and service. It will stop us from returning, however we will go to outside restaurants for our meals.

Beautiful staff members who looked after us well, enjoyed the turn down service, prompt cleaning of rooms, room was comfortable perfectly clean, the buffet breakfast is outstanding the best Ive ever had travel Indonesia

Andrie was extremely helpful and professional throughout my stay. He quickly resolved my concerns and went above and beyond to ensure I felt valued. Thanks to him and the team, I look forward to coming back again. Highly recommended!
Enjoyed our time here. It's a beautiful resort in Nusa Dua with lots of activities to do. The breakfast buffet is one of the biggest I've ever seen with so many options!

We had a wonderful stay at Sofitel in Nusa Dua! The service was truly outstanding‚Äîeveryone was incredibly friendly, kind, and attentive from the moment we arrived. The entire resort was spotless, and everything felt very well maintained. Breakfast was a highlight each morning with an impressive variety and everything we tried was absolutely delicious. We also loved the pool bar‚Äîcocktails were great, and happy hour every afternoon made it even better. The spa services were top-notch; we chose the gazebo option and it was such a peaceful, relaxing experience. A little mall with decent options is also located nearby (Bali Collection) and there are shuttles from the hotel, but we chose to walk and it ended up being a nice nightly stroll for us. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a luxurious and serene getaway in Bali!

Just checked in and found the welcome quite average, especially at the reception. We‚Äôve stayed at other Sofitels before, but so far, this stay seems to be the disappointing one. We were delayed by 45 minutes before getting into our rooms ‚Äî a late check-in, despite arriving on time. All we received was a half-hearted apology. We‚Äôll be staying here for two more days, and I truly hope the experience improves. We spent two days at M√∂venpick earlier and are already wishing we had stayed there for the rest of our trip. I‚Äôll keep this post updated. 24/07: Updating my rating to 4 stars as the resort staff later contacted me, apologised for the 45-minute delay which we appreciated (we were also offered a complimentary service); additionally, we liked the kids club and thoroughly enjoyed the private beach.

The staff were definitely the highlight of our stay. Bayu, Ayu and Nicky made sure we always had a point of contact during our stay and gave warm & genuine customer service. Subrata looked after us and our suite perfectly, ensuring we had everything we needed at all times. Overall, the Sofitel didn't meet our expectations. What we felt let the experience down was the layout of the breakfast buffet (difficult with different rooms/zones for food. Lack of AC), the quality of food and beverages, the lack of space in the pool area, maintenance of the pool with numerous loose/broken tiles.
Sofitel dengan fasilitas yang lengkap dan baik sangat rekomen untuk liburan keluarga.. Kids clubnya bagus dengan staffs yang helpful.. terimakasih Ms Juni, Asri, Eka dan Yonita..

PROS: ‚Ä¢ Stayed in room D5215. August 2025. ‚Ä¢ Large breakfast buffet with decent range of food ‚Ä¢ Cucina restaurant serves very nice Italian food and Wira was a standout waiter. Food overpriced for what you get. ‚Ä¢ Rooms spacious and well appointed. ‚Ä¢ Check in process relatively efficient yet they tried to do a lot of upselling on Accor Club which was frustrating as we weren't interested. ‚Ä¢ Hotel located along a nice beach but honestly, Sanur is much better as there's so much more to do. ‚Ä¢ Hotel remotely located from shops. If wanting to go to Bali Collection (rip off) it's a IDR50k each way fare. ‚Ä¢ CONS: ‚Ä¢ Gym small for 413 rooms and not enough cardio machines which are tucked away in a back room. Also, one treadmill was broken taking them down to 3 treadmills which is too few for a hotel of this size. ‚Ä¢ Pool area disjointed and has these ridiculous sun beds over water so you can easily drop your belongings into the pool. ‚Ä¢ Food offering by the pool is OK but don't offer a pizza- they are terrible! Considering the hotel has a wonderful pizza oven in Cucina, you would think they'd be able to cook good Pizzas during the day. ‚Ä¢ Bikes not free to rent but they should be. Lots of activities on offer at hotel but all are user paid. This is disappointing given the room rates. There was supposedly water aerobics on at 11am each day but in our 5 days we couldn't find this. ‚Ä¢ Insufficient sunbeds for 413 rooms. ‚Ä¢ Kids pool area limited compared to other nearby hotels. ‚Ä¢ Rooms not well insulated with lots of noise from other rooms and corridor throughout night. ‚Ä¢ When doorbell rings to adjoining room, it sounds like its coming to our room. ‚Ä¢ Room slippers provided are very basic and for a hotel where you are paying $AUD700 a night, you'd expect better quality. ‚Ä¢ Breakfast buffet needs to be mixed up more. After 5 days i had had enough of the same offerings. ‚Ä¢ Range of vegan options at breakfast limited (i.e. I couldn't find almond milk or decent tasting coconut yoghurt) ‚Ä¢ Turn down service is poor with them only replacing water and closing blinds (if they turn up at all). Turn down service should include fruits or a chocolate at a hotel that charges this much. ‚Ä¢ Room cleaning was done at about 4pm each day which is unacceptable. Way too late. Room cleaning and turn down service were often combined. ‚Ä¢ Bed not overly comfortable. Base hard. ‚Ä¢ Pool area cramped in like sardines. All other hotels along Nusa Dua strip are much larger and so much more space.

Amazing Stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua ‚Äì Especially for Families We had a wonderful experience at the Sofitel Nusa Dua! The resort is stunning, well-kept, and incredibly family-friendly. A special shoutout to Sri, who looked after us every morning at breakfast. She was so kind and attentive ‚Äî always happy to help with anything we needed for our toddler who had just turned 2, from warming up milk to making sure we had a high chair ready. It made our mornings so much smoother and more enjoyable. Highly recommend this resort for families looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay with thoughtful service.

I had a wonderful stay at Sofitel. The hotel was elegant and comfortable, but what stood out most was the excellent service from Wikan. He was friendly, attentive, and made my stay truly memorable. Highly recommended!
We enjoyed our stay in the resort. Friendly and helpful staff. Clear and well check in and check outprogress. Clean room and lots of activities in the resort. Everything just fell easy

It was our first time at the Sofitel Nusa Dua and we were not disappointed. We booked a two bed villa with a private pool which was absolutely huge. The kids bedroom had two king single beds and is only accessible from inside the villa (many villas we have looked at before booking the Sofitel provided access to the kids/secondary bedroom from outside the villa which is a no no for us with two young kids). The location was perfect, being right by the beach and close to lots of restaurants and other hotels. The service was faultless - we had a morning butler and evening butler who catered to all our needs (special mention to Suci, Eddie, Ayu and Bagus, and Triana from the Kids Club). The hotel is very kid friendly with an on site kids club with a daily schedule. The only thing we thought could be improved was the consistency of food across all restaurants - Toya was good for lunch and dinner (although twice they had run out of a number of dishes on different days), Kwee Zeen served up a mean buffet breakfast with so much choice. However, we were disappointed with the room service food- the quality was nowhere near as good as we had seen in the restaurants, and the food served by the pool was rather poor too - their tuna sandwich had barely any tuna in it, more like a finger roll with egg salad. All in all, we did have a great stay at the Sofitel and the kids thoroughly enjoyed their time there.

Great stay with all inclusive luxury escapes. Pool is great for kids. Food through out resort is average. Cucina poor quality as is Toya. Staff are exceptional, especially ASIH who kept the room tidy and Darma at the Pool was an awesome host.

Since arrived, we already greet by Mr. Udayana. A friendly gesture from him, make us with our baby very happy. As an accor gold, Mr. Udayana gave a very nice upgrade on this. Thank you! All the staff from breakfast, to children room, to pool, and also beach is very helpfull, and the upgrade room is an above expectation. The beach actually very clean and enjoyable. We stayed for 3 nights, we found the variety of the breakfast is very nice, especially you noodle station live cooking for mie goreng üòÅ To mentioned you, your staff very helpfull regarding several request everyday from our room (heating the baby food, water, etc.) Top notch hospitality and enjoyable location. Thank you Sofitel, yes deffinitely will coming back.

I had a wonderful dining experience at Kwee Zeen. Everything was absolutely delicious, from start to finish, with each dish perfectly prepared and full of flavor. The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, making the whole evening even more enjoyable. A special thank you to our server, Deva, whose professionalism, attentiveness, and genuine friendliness made the experience exceptional. Deva truly went above and beyond ‚Äî his service was impeccable and greatly appreciated. Highly recommended!

Absolutely stunning location and excellent facilities all throughout the hotel. Very family friendly with lots of activities to do for younger kids. Would highly recommend making some time for the breakfast buffet each morning.
We had a very relaxing experience at the resort. It was fun for our 3 year old. We had a great time exploring the area as well.

Warm and friendly service. However, let down by the fact that the 4pm late checkout as part of the family offer I booked was not honoured (and was told I would need to pay extra for). Food was uninspired and poorly executed. Wine at cucina was overpriced and terrible. Pool had loose tiles throughout that were a hazard to young children.

My stay was very pleasant. I was warmly welcomed upon arrival and kindly farewelled by the lobby staff. The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff were exceptionally kind and attentive throughout my stay.

We had breakfast and dinner at Kwee Zeen to celebrate our friend‚Äôs 55th birthday. In both instances, we were afforded great service, surprising our birthday celebrant twice with a birthday cake brought by the singing staff. Staff are very friendly, special mention to Mediani, Devita and Mira. Terima Kasih.

With an incredible buffet breakfast, awesome lobby bar with ocean breezes, awesome pool and and exceptional room, Sofitel exceeded our expectations. The decor was amazing and the staff exuded kindness, professionalism and amazing attention to detail to provide an elite level of customer service enhancing our experience. With our anniversary, they gave us an ocean from room with anniversary gifts to make our visit even more special. We will cherish and fondly remember our time at Sofitel,

Our room 1208 attendant his name Sugi, he has kept our room in excellent condition and very clean everyday. Replenish towels, soap, water, fresh fruits. Our door could not open today but the two technicians came and fixed straight away replacing new battery on door for the card to work again. The reception team are very professional and very helpful. All the staffs at Sofitel are so polite and helpful in breakfast restaurant. The swimming pool attendants are very good in arranging towels and deck chair. Garden is very well maintained and clean. Location is very good by the beach. I cannot fault the service we have received Well deserved five stars

We planned our two days stay here long time ago! We arrived here and everything was more than magnificent!!! Mr De.Agus took care of every detail! The room was perfect every time!! So clean, so deep prepared and with many complimentaries!! We suggest Sofitel Nusa Dua with no doubts!!!

Our stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua was simply amazing ‚Äì the resort is beautiful, the rooms luxurious, and the atmosphere serene. The highlight was the outstanding kindness and professionalism of the hotel staff. A wonderful example was Yulyastika and Yuda at Toya restaurant, whose warm and attentive service made our dining experience truly memorable. Highly recommended both for the hotel and especially for the exceptional hospitality.

We had an amazing dining experience at La Cucina, Sofitel. The food was delicious, beautifully presented, and the atmosphere was elegant yet relaxing. A special thank you to Arya, our server, who was exceptionally attentive, friendly, and made our evening truly memorable. Highly recommended!

Hotel is beautiful and comfortable with excellent service and facilities. It is very comparable to other resorts in nusa dua but it does cost a premium so for that I give it a 4 star review. Loved it being in the nusa dua complex so the grounds and surrounding areas were clean and manicured. Rooms were standard but very comfortable and well maintained.

Great hotel and superb location. From arrival to check, had a smooth exquisite process with great staff and super customer service. Was upgraded to a better room which was good. Room was fantastic with bathtub and view of resort. Twin bed pushed together was the only downside. Restaurant Kwee Zeen was another highlight of our stay. Great menu with diverse cuisines and had the pleasure of our host Ms Sinta who was exceptional in her work and her welcoming smile felt incredible. I really hope the hotel recognises her talents. Overall, an amazing 2 night stay at an amazing hotel.

A beautiful resort offering something for everyone. Excellent pool facilities, bars and restaurants and magnificent gardens and surroundings. I can thoroughly recommend Sofitel Nusa Dua for families, groups or couples.
We had an excellent stay at Sofitel. From the warm welcome to the end, it was amazing. People were nice, the rooms well designed and clean, nothing missed. Thank you Sofitel team!

Almost perfect stay, service is awesome, plenty of activities and we had a dance show in the evening, breakfast and restaurants serve delicious local food. Room is large with a nice design however it needs a refresh. In my opinion they need to tackle the humidity issue, had a strange smell like the room windows weren‚Äôt opened enough, my entry lights were not working when I arrived but has been fixed quickly. Bathroom sliding doors didn't slide properly leaving some marks on the floor. Shower hose had black stains, I guess due to humidity, which doesn‚Äôt look ‚Äòclean‚Äô. Overall a very pleasant stay, there are few details that make the difference between a good and perfect stay considering it is a 5 stars hotel.

Sofitel bali nusa dua stayed true to its heritage. The staff are courteous and well trained, Accor plus status are observed and honored, and the facilities are clean and well maintained. Will be back again soon.

We loved our stay at the Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua. The service is genuine and very friendly. You couldn't help, but smile. The rooms are spacious and modern. The food was superb. The pools are great. Great space to relax and plenty of lounge chairs. Thankyou for a memorable experience.

Have nothing to criticise, will be back and next time with the kids. After staying and checking out facilities kids would love to holiday at the Sofitel in the future. Wish we booked a room with direct access to the pool.

Check in is convenient, seated in air conditioned room. The resort itself is well maintained. The resort surroundings and room is bright, airy, and with a lot of lightings which is important for me. We really appreciate sofitel can deliver our requested anniversary greetings for our 38th anniversary parents with very cute decoration upon checking in. And it is with no charge. Such a luxurious experience. The pool and pool bar is really nice. The beach is great as well, we cam swim in it. There is pathways at the beach for morningwalks to surroundings.

Sensational experience for my first visit to Bali! Everything is magical, top class facility that is faultless, especially every super lovely and kind, friendly staff. We did the chic picnic, and our waiter Catur was awesome. Waited nearby on the beach the whole time in case we needed anything, and it was a magical feast and special moment. The place to be in Bali and will be back for sure!

Ketemu staff baik sekali namanya kak Diah,, sopan & ramah, mau mengantarkan ke kamar, walaupun beda lantai & jauh,,, Terima kasih Oh ya suasananya OK banget, kamar berrsih, Bfast ok,, recommended Hotel in Nusa Dua.
The service standard in this hotel is super. The restaurant is good also. The butler is very helpful especially bli edi and mbok yuli Good stay
Great resort with beach access. Kids pool with the slide was a hit! Food options could be improved and the smell by the waterfalls in the pools should be treated.

Saya ketinggalan barang dan minta tolong untuk dikirim via gojek ke hotel dimana saya stay berikutnya, minta tlg di bayarkan dahulu sejumlah 23 rb dan sy minta no rkng petugasnya , karena saya sedang di luar. Tapi pihak hotel keberatan dan tdk mengirimkan padahal esoknya saya pulang. Utk hotel dengan rate 3.000.000 per malam tapi tdk mau menalangi 23 rb, sangat mengecewakan

From the moment we arrived at Sofitel Bali, we were welcomed with such warmth and genuine smiles that instantly set the tone for a truly memorable stay. A special thank you to Ria from reception, who made our check-in seamless. Management also surprised us with a beautiful honeymoon cake and a room upgrade to a spacious suite in a perfect spot ‚Äî we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better start to our honeymoon! The attention to detail and care shown throughout our stay was outstanding. Our dinner at Cucina was another highlight, thanks to Sangi, who treated us like VIPs. The food was delicious, the ambiance romantic, and the service impeccable. Every staff member we encountered had a smiling face and went out of their way to ensure our comfort. This wasn‚Äôt just a stay ‚Äî it was an experience we‚Äôll always treasure. Thank you, Sofitel Bali, for making our honeymoon truly special. Keep up the amazing work!

I had such a wonderful experience at YULYNSTIKA! The food was absolutely delicious ‚Äî every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. The atmosphere was cozy yet vibrant, making it the perfect place to relax and enjoy a night out. What made it even more special was the live music performance ‚Äî it added so much charm and energy to the evening. Highly recommend this place for great food, great vibes, and a memorable time!

Just had the best Sofitel experience yet at Nusa Dua Bali. The service was warm, genuine, and truly memorable. I‚Äôve stayed at several Sofitels before, but this one stood out‚Äîespecially thanks to the exceptional team at Club Mill√©sime. A special thank you to Widya from concierge, who went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfectly arranged, even before we arrived. Outstanding hospitality that would have taken a huge effort behind the scenes.

Stayed here for 7 days. Place looked amazing and staff were friendly. Food at every restaurant was amazing and could not fault the taste and quality. I was just disappointed that we had a leak in our bathroom that ruined most of my makeup etc. The issue was fixed by a plumber but nobody from the hotel touched based to see if all had been fixed and an apology for the damage that it had caused. I was also disappointed on the last day when I wanted a glass of water from the bar and the bartender said I had to buy it or have the tap water! I asked if the tap water was ok to drink and his reply was no not really. Not what I would expect from a 5 star hotel.
Loved our stay. Fabulous hotel and as always the service makes so much more enjoyable. Yudi and Eva looked after my room and did a great job !! Thank you to all.

Thank you sofitel bali nusa dua tempat yg sangat nyaman dan romatis dg semua staff yg sangat ramah dan bersahabat Guest service / operatornya memberikan service yg cepat saat request air minum atau item yg di lain servicenya sangat cepat Terima kasih banyak untuk semua pelayanan terbaiknya.

This is our first visit to this beautiful resort. The service was fantastic especially our room attendant (Gede Ame) who was the most helpful, polite and friendly. The pools are great with plenty of comfortable chairs and food was delicious. We‚Äôd like to thank Ame for attentiveness and we‚Äôll be back!

Coming to Sofitel is like coming home. Sofitel adalah pilihan favorit keluarga kami setiap ke Bali sejak tahun 2013. Begitu banyak kenangan setiap menginap di sini. Kedatangan kami tahun ini sangat berkesan dengan keramahan seluruh staff di Sofitel. Terutama Ibu Asri (Receptionist) yang membantu dari proses check in sampai check out dengan sangat sabar dan ramah. Lalu Mbak Eka & Mbak Asri di Kids Club yang dengan sabar menemani anak¬≤ bermain di sana. Tidak lupa dengan Mario (Attendant) yang selalu sigap membantu memenuhi kelengkapan amenities di kamar dan merapikan kamar kami. SOFITEL is AWESOME and never fail to make us amaze!!!
Amazing Breakfast. Especially great hospitality and service by Alex Kwee Zeen at the breakfast lounge. Very respectful and polite. Very impressed by his service in particular

My family and I had an amazing time at this resort. Our rooms were spacious and clean. Our stay was made extra special by our butlers, Angga, Yuli and Edi who were friendly, checked in on us daily and booked activities and restaurants for us. We enjoyed our drinks and snacks at Club Millesime, which were presented nicely and contained a good range of fruit, pastries, hot food; cold meats and salads. The pool was very relaxing and the ambience of the lagoon was tranquil. The swim up bar was also very cool.

This was my favorite place in all our travels over the last 11 years. We had a Villa with a garden patio, private entrance, separate living room with glass doors to our private pool. It was an exquisite room. All of the staff were friendly, and called you by name. I room was alway immaculate all the time as well as the patio area. Alit was our attendant and did a fabulous job. We are planning on coming back.

From the moment I booked through the app, my experience at Sofitel Nusa Dua was nothing short of exceptional. I received a thoughtful pre-arrival email asking about my preferences and dietary requirements‚Äîsomething few hotels ever consider. This level of personalized care made me feel at home even before I arrived. Having stayed at renowned properties such as Raffles and Kempinski, I can confidently say that Sofitel Nusa Dua exceeded all expectations. The Ambassadors at Sofitel truly embody the spirit of hospitality. Every guest is made to feel genuinely welcome and cared for‚Äîsomething even the most prestigious hotels sometimes miss. Service throughout the hotel was flawless. Every staff member we encountered was warm, friendly, and eager to help. I‚Äôve stayed at many properties in Nusa Dua, including big-name resorts, but very few come close to this level of service. One moment that really stood out was during in-room dining: the chef personally crafted a diabetes-friendly Soto Ayam just for me. That extra effort left a lasting impression‚Äîit was both thoughtful and unforgettable. As a family-friendly resort, Sofitel also shines. The kids‚Äô club is among the best equipped I‚Äôve seen. It allowed my child to enjoy quality time while my wife and I could relax over a quiet lunch or a drink together‚Äîsomething we deeply appreciated. That said, there were a few areas for improvement. The room, while very clean, showed signs of wear. The flooring and furniture could use better maintenance. Upon arrival, the faucet in the bathroom was broken and required a visit from engineering. The showerhead didn‚Äôt provide a consistent spray, and the bed felt uneven‚Äîslightly lower at the head side. Despite these minor issues, our departure experience was a perfect closing note. The checkout was quick and seamless. Instead of standing in line, we were invited to relax while an Ambassador handled everything and informed us when it was complete‚Äîanother example of their impeccable service. In conclusion, no other hotel stay‚Äîpast or present‚Äîhas matched the personalized hospitality and warmth we experienced at Sofitel Nusa Dua. It was truly a memorable stay, and we look forward to returning.

On my final day in Bali, I sought solace and rejuvenation at the Sofitel, hoping to restore my mind and lift my spirits. Regrettably, from the moment I arrived, I encountered setbacks that overshadowed my expectations. The bathtub faucet was broken, requiring over 45 minutes of maintenance to repair. While the room itself was tastefully appointed (I saw nothing but the parking lot), the poor soundproofing allowed me to hear the guest next door shouting to others early in the morning. Additionally, the sauna and steam room were non-operational‚Äîan especially disappointing shortcoming during a peak national holiday period. The staff were courteous and communicative throughout my stay, but the overall facility clearly falls short compared to other hotels in the same price range where amenities function seamlessly. It remains puzzling why such critical facilities were out of service at a time when guests are likely to seek relaxation and comfort the most.
Nice hotel with a great service and hospitality All the staffs are nice and helpful. I really enjoyed my stay here.
We are really enjoying the Sofitel at Nusa Dua. Pande was fantastic, and our room is perfect. Will definitely be back.

We had a fantastic stay at the Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort. The hotel is beautifully located, offering easy access to the beach and nearby attractions. Service throughout was excellent, warm, attentive, and professional. We were delighted to receive a complimentary upgrade to the honeymoon suite with ocean views, which made our stay even more special. The room was spacious, elegant, and well appointed. Febri greeted us warmly upon arrival and sent us off with a friendly farewell when we left. Her helpfulness and kind demeanor added to the memorable experience. Ria looked after us during breakfast, and she was absolutely amazing! What is not to love? Highly recommended Sofitel for a luxurious and memorable Bali getaway!

Stayed at the Sofitel Nusa Dua for 4 nights, stayed in a suite, which was beautiful, light airy, spacious, the bed and pillows were so comfortable. A big Thank you to our butlers, Edi, Suci and Diah, they were extremely friendly, helpful and attentive during our stay, making our holiday a very relaxing one.
Wonderful hotel with lot of benefits as an A+ member. Seamless check in process and nice room upgrade Will sure be back for next holiday

Sofitel Beach Reaort Nusa Dua Bali is an amazing place to stay while in Bali. We loved every moment of our stay in Nusa Dua Sofitel. Check in was shift and Okta was at reception who made our check in a pleasant experience. We give him 5 stars. Room service was amazing as well. Met Suta from House keeping who cleaned and tidied our room. He made sure that the room was well stocked and cleaned to perfection. We give him 5 stars as well. Thank you Sofitel Beach Resort Nusa Dua team for making our stay a pleasant one.

We had a lovely family holiday (all adults) at the Sofitel Nusa Dua. The resort was clean and kept really well. The staff were all very good but I‚Äôd like to particularly mention Rista, Siska at Kwee Zeen, Ayu at Toya who were super friendly and helpful, and Gede Ame our room attendant who kept our rooms immaculate. 3 of us also had a massage at the beachfront bungalows which was amazing and something we normally wouldn‚Äôt do! The pool was so nice and the chlorine wasn‚Äôt too strong :) Nusa Dua is quite far if you‚Äôre wanting to spend the day in Canguu or Seminyak. In saying that, we did anyway and so long as you‚Äôve got a good driver who can recommend what time to depart, you might not get stuck in hours of traffic. I think I would prefer to stay in this area again where it‚Äôs nice and quiet rather than be constantly in the hustle and bustle. Overall it was an excellent holiday and I‚Äôd highly recommend it and would love to visit again.

Our stay at Sofitel in a pool Access luxury king room with club Milleseme Was outstanding. The service from all the staff was amazing, special thanks to Mario our room attendant for ensuring our room was maintained to the highest standard. Loved the gym, spa and pools the resort is so huge it didn‚Äôt feel busy at all . We will definitely return. Thankyou

We have had a lovely holiday at Sofitel Nusa Dua. A beautiful well looked after resort , with great swimming pools and restaurants. Thank you to Sri who looked after us so well at breakfast and Juliada who kept our room beautiful ! We will be back . Thank you

Arriving past midnight with arranged transfer by Sofitel with complete requested room getup allowed us to rest very well. Butler Diah was very hands-on and seemingly superwoman arranging all in-house requests including tours of the island. Massage by Nata was also very great. Besides hotel amenities, excellent HR experience really was felt.

Overall, a good experience: very friendly staff, beautiful setting, amazing pool, tasty food and relaxing place to be. A few things could have been improved - check in was delayed 2.5 hours, enquiries were lost and had to be followed up on several times, and drink orders would occasionally go missing.

This is our third stay at the Sofitel Nusa Dua, and as on previous visits, we enjoyed the professionalism, hospitality and kindness we met throughout this wonderful hotel. Regardless of the time of day or how busy or quiet the hotel might be, everyone we met took the time to smile and greet us by asking us how we were. We have been fortunate to be allocated our favourite room on each visit, a ground floor room with pool access, as we do love the convenience of being able to hop into the pool at any time we choose with such ease. As ACCOR members with lounge access we were taken to the Millesime Lounge to register our arrival and were shown to our room where we were greeted by a beautiful display of flowers, fruits and cakes to welcome our return. It is such a treat to be so spoilt. Although the weather was inclement during most of our stay, there was still much to do and enjoy. The walks along the beach in front of the hotel are well maintained and there is much to enjoy in the large pool with its bar and at the other venues throughout the hotel, including gym and spa. The rooms were beautifully serviced twice a day, and the grounds and facitilies are immaculately clean and well maintained. As we noticed on our previous visit, rooms are continually being repainted and refreshed. We enjoyed an evening meal at Cucina‚Äôs the Italian themed restaurant and it was just as lovely as we can remember from our earlier stays. For those with lounge access the afternoon tea and cocktail hour was so well catered that we found we did not really require anything further to eat during the evening. Breakfasts were always excellent with a wonderful choice both from the buffet or from the menu, with the staff took great care catering for special diets. Lots of gluten free options available.
