The main restaurant downstairs was very popular and we heard many words of praise from other guests about the presentation and quality of the menu. Thank you to everyone who once again made our stay so memorable. Thank you Sugi for the wonderful spa treatment enjoyed during my stay. Particular thanks to Tri the executive manager of the lounge and to the lovely Yuli C M, Kristina, Ayu and everyone in the lounge who took us under their wings during our stay. We are already looking forward to our return!

Brilliant stay. Luxurious facilities, but it‚Äôs really the people and service that set it apart. Across 7 days, I think every single worker said hello when we walked past. Couple of minor room issues, immediately fixed within minutes of raising them. Breakfast is unreal, every possible food you could imagine. We had two restaurants included in our package for dinner. The seafood restaurant on the beach was very good, the dinner buffet was fairly average. Not quite up to the standard elsewhere in the hotel. We paid for dinner at the Italian restaurant one night, outstanding.

This was truly the best experience I‚Äôve ever had at a resort. From the moment I arrived, the warm welcome set the tone for a memorable stay. I was greeted kindly by Nindiya at the front desk, and I want to give a special thanks to Kessy from Club Mill√©sime, who went above and beyond, she carefully explained all the privileges and made sure everything was perfect from the start. I was incredibly grateful to receive an upgrade to the Plunge Pool Room. The space was serene, peaceful, an ideal setting to relax and unwind. Breakfast was another highlight, with a wide selection ranging from flavorful Asian dishes to classic Western options. Everything was fresh and beautifully presented. Thank you so much Sofitel Bali.

We had the most incredible experience during our honeymoon stay at the Sofitel Resort in Nusa Dua. From the moment we arrived, we were blown away by the exceptional service. The staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and truly special‚Äîespecially when they learned it was our honeymoon. We were greeted with a thoughtful surprise that added a personal touch to our stay. The resort itself is stunning, with beautiful, well-maintained grounds and luxurious accommodations. Our room was spacious, elegantly designed, and offered breathtaking views. Every detail, from the decor to the comfort of the bed, was perfect. The food at Sofitel was a highlight as well. Whether we were enjoying breakfast at the main restaurant, dining by the pool, or indulging in a romantic dinner, the variety and quality of the food were top-notch. The flavors were rich and authentic, and the presentation was always impressive. Speaking of the pool‚Äîwhat an oasis! The expansive pool area was perfect for relaxing, with comfortable sunbeds and a tranquil atmosphere. We spent hours enjoying the serene surroundings and refreshing waters. Overall, our stay at Sofitel Resort was unforgettable. The staff, the food, the hotel itself, and the pool all made it the perfect place to celebrate our honeymoon. We can‚Äôt wait to return!

Wow what a great Hotel / Resort for a holiday. We had a package that included Breakfast, Lunch Or Dinner, Cocktails every day, Massage, Cooking Class, Yoga, Bottle of Wine & Transfers. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more ! Amenities are perfect with a huge pool, beach pathway & walk, Breakfast variety the best we have ever experienced, All Staff were extremely helpful and service was over and above what you expect. Our room, which was quite large with a balcony and very big bathroom, was made up very well by WIDARTA everyday with twice daily checkups to make sure we had everything we needed (bottles of water etc etc).The 2 main Restaurants are very good with Toya restaurant providing our daily cocktails with special service provided by VIVI, who made sure we where well looked after. Definitely the place to stay in Bali for us. We wish to thank everyone at the Hotel / Resort and highly recommend it.
Kids club nya sangat bagus dan banyak aktifitasnya, miss nya juga telaten dan ramah.. thanks ms Juni, Asri, Yonita, Dian, Massri, Ida!!

Had a great time in Sofitel Bali. The room and hotel staff all around were polite, friendly and kids oriented. Special shoutout to Wikan from the Kwee Zeen restaurant staff who entertained my son for both breakfast and dinner while going about his duties.
Five-star experience. Lovely resort, the staff were all friendly and helpful. Great amenities, great location.

I love this lovely resort. Thank you, for the lovely surprise in the upgrade of room. The room we stayed is very clean, bed very comfortable, so as the pillows too and great view of the beach. From the reservation team, concierge, reception, housekeeping, F&B team are all very friendly and accommodating. During our stay we had dinner at Kwee Zeen Restaurant, we were served by Miss Sinta a trainee. She‚Äôs fabulous always smiling and regular follow ups. She‚Äôs an asset to the resort, not many has that quality. Good job to her. The breakfast team is also very good, Miss Wangi who served us was very attentive. We also had dinner at Cucina, excellent service and food.

Our stay at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua was nothing short of a dream ‚Äî a seamless fusion of five-star luxury, heartfelt Balinese hospitality, and chic French sophistication. From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed not just as guests, but as family ‚Äî and that feeling stayed with us until the very last goodbye. The staff deserve a standing ovation. Gracious, attentive, and always greeting with a genuine smile, they anticipated our needs before we even voiced them. From the front desk to housekeeping, from the beach attendants to Club Mill√©sime hosts ‚Äî every interaction was a masterclass in hospitality. It's rare to feel so genuinely cared for, and the Sofitel team truly delivers that magic. Our room was an oasis in itself ‚Äî elegant, spacious, and designed with both comfort and aesthetics in mind. The plush bedding, the freestanding tub, the subtle touches of local artistry ‚Äî everything whispered indulgence. And let‚Äôs not forget the serene view of the pool and gardens, which felt like waking up in paradise each morning. Club Mill√©sime elevated our experience to an entirely different level. The exclusivity, the curated gourmet bites, the afternoon tea, and evening cocktails ‚Äî all served with finesse and, once again, the warmth of exceptional staff who remembered our preferences with charming precision. The beachfront location is another crown jewel. Clean, calm, and picturesque ‚Äî perfect for a morning stroll, a lazy afternoon with cocktails, or a sunset soak in serenity. The beachfront pool and cabanas added an extra layer of luxury to the already lush tropical surroundings. The entire resort is immaculately maintained ‚Äî every corner exudes elegance, from the grand lobby to the tranquil gardens and winding pathways. Despite its size, it feels intimate and peaceful, thanks to the incredible staff who create a personal connection with each guest. Sofitel Nusa Dua isn‚Äôt just a resort ‚Äî it‚Äôs a destination in itself. A place where every detail is refined, every moment is cherished, and every guest is treated like royalty. We left with hearts full and memories we'll treasure for a lifetime. A heartfelt thank you to the entire Sofitel team ‚Äî you made our stay unforgettable.

Recently stayed at the Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua! We had the absolute best time ‚Äî the resort is just stunning, and the warmth and care from the team made it extra special. We honestly didn‚Äôt want to leave! We‚Äôll be telling all our friends and family that it is the place to stay ‚Äî we can‚Äôt recommend it highly enough. The buffet breakfast is insane, so many food stations to discover. We‚Äôre already planning our stay there for next year. As a Platinum member with Accor we received an upgraded room and an invitation to an exclusive cocktail hour meet and greet with the staff, a lovely way to start the holiday. Can't wait for our next visit.

We had the best time, the thought of traveling 9 hours from NZ with two small kids was daunting.. but once we arrived all was worth it. Everything from the room, service, buffet breakfast, restaurants, to drinks was fantastic. Multiple pools, restaurants and places to get massages. Truly relaxing ‚Ä¶ even with two kids under 4! Highly recommend

We loved our stay at the Sofitel Nusa Dua, it‚Äôs our 3rd time here and 3rd time in the Prestige Suite, and 3rd time having our room serviced by Mario. Thanks so much Mario for making our home away from home feel so comfortable.

I absoloutely loved my stay at the Sofitel Nusa Dua. If anyone is looking for a hotel, I strongly recommend to come here, you will not be disappointed. The staff are so lovely and attentive. When walking past they will greet you and smile. Multiple times during my stay I was amazed by the kindness and genuine helpfullness displayed by all the staff. The amenities are top of the game, for example the AMAZING pool area, the fitness centre, the spa. Having a weekly activities schedule is so thoughtful and fun. The pool is so beyond beautiful and relaxing, with a swim up bar, and many different places to sit and relax. The fitness centre is well equipped, clean, and staff are so attentive and kind in the gym, eagerly leading you to the different sections of the gym. The rooms are so nice and clean. They have everything you could need, and upon arrival they had done a lovely platter of fruits and little sweets as we are an accor member. The member's lounge is so lovely and such a nice place to relax, especially the afternoon tea and cocktail hour was outstanding. The resturants in this resort are delicious, with a wide range of foods and different places to eat, which is great if you are staying for a longer time. I really loved the detail in this hotel, such as having beautifully arranged rocks on the walk to your room. The soaps are top quality. In the bathrooms there were flowers placed on the counter. They gave us gorgous sofitel bracelets when we arrived. The fact that staff made an effort to remember and use our names. Overall, this is the best hotel I have ever been to and I HIGHLY reccomend anyone visiting Bali to stay here. Thankyou so much to the lovely staff who looked after us during our stay ‚ù§Ô∏è

It's my second time at Sofitel Nusa Dua. This time for our honeymoon. I highly recommend the hotel. It's a wonderful place, has great calm beach and the crew is super friendly and helpful. The breakfast buffet is amazing with many options. One small downside: the coffee is not super good. If you have a the diamond/platinum status at Accor I recommend to check out the club lounge. It offers a calm breakfast, nice drinks during the day and an apero in the evening. However, paying the upgrade for the access is probably not worth it.

Excellent beach location and a wonderful modern resort. The staff were simply amazing and made our stay all the more enjoyable and memorable. We were greeted each day by everyone from the moment we left our room until our return with a polite smile and acknowledgement. It is the staff that really make the stay so good, from Michelly at breakfast, Rizky, Josa and Suweta at the pool and Mary and Eka at Toya Beach Bar, all of them and many more were amazing. From check in to check out we couldn‚Äôt have been treated any better. We wanted a relaxing holiday and that is what we had, the water both in the pool and in the ocean was magnificent and our early morning walks along the foreshore was wonderful. We will return again without hesitation. üôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª

hat made us feel like we were the most important guests. It was the perfect getaway for our family ‚Äì my wife, my son, and I were blown away by every detail of our stay. The property itself is a stunning oasis, with lush gardens, breathtaking views, and luxurious spaces that we couldn‚Äôt get enough of. Our room was spacious and beautifully designed, providing a serene retreat for all of us. We loved waking up to the sound of the ocean and feeling completely at peace in such a beautiful setting. What truly stood out was the exceptional service. Every staff member went out of their way to ensure that our family had everything we needed. My son was especially treated with such care and attention, which made our experience even more special. The kids‚Äô activities were fantastic, and he had the best time exploring all the fun options available, from the pool to the organized games. The dining experience was equally remarkable. We enjoyed every meal ‚Äì from delicious local specialties to international dishes that suited everyone‚Äôs taste. The atmosphere was perfect for a family, and we loved sharing meals together while enjoying the beautiful surroundings. Thank you, Sofitel Bali, for making our family holiday one we will always cherish. The memories we‚Äôve made here will stay with us forever, and we can‚Äôt wait to return for another unforgettable experience.

We have had another amazing holiday here at Sofitel where again we have been made to feel like old friends reuniting. We absolutely fully adored our stay. Our room was serviced by the amazing Mario who was beyond attentive and always checking our needs. As well as his infectious smile everyday. Staff in club were also outstanding. So many names to mention but from the cleaner in the club to the GM ALL AMAZING. Our trip would not have been so fantastic if it was for our usual faves Tri, Edi, Nicky Sutri Lesari Marini, Kristina Yuli Velin Ami. All go above and beyond and what make this place amazing. Moved from Seminiyak to Sofitel Nusa Dua and fell in love with the resort and the general location from the very start. Sofitel is a great, world-class resort with superb facilities all-round. Nusa Dua is a beautiful, modern and well planned part of Bali. This is where world leaders have conferences and meetings. Sofitel has a stunning reception area with views of the ocean. We loved our private plunge pool, large and expansive rooms. Unfortunately, my spouse who has a super sense of smell had issues with bad smells possibly coming out of the aircon or somewhere in the room. Our plunge pool had a few uneven tiles showing evidence of post construction repairs. These tiles posed a risk of injury in the pool Our biggest gripe was the Kwee Zeen restaurant where we were having our breakfast and buffet dinner. Kwee Zeen's offerings are a bit underwhelming. The food definitely needs an improvement in terms of variety and quality. Some of the attendants at Kwee Zeen had some challenges with their command of the English language thereby presenting a bit of a communication barrier. Unfortunately, we never had a chance to sample other restuarents such as Cucina restaurant. Manarai Beach house atmosphere was okay but the chicken wings we ordered were just too sweet. In terms of food offering we found the Toya Beach Bar and Grill had better quality than Manarai. The customer service at both Beach venues was excellent. Mey, at Manarai had excellent customer skills . She did welcome us and serve us very well. The guy who served us free ice cream at Toya Beach Bar was also superb. In general the people are great. The manager on duty at during our time was also immaculate. I think his name is Andrei. He handled the issue relating to our broken baggage immaculately. At checkout we were served by Febri who went over and above to make us feel at home. We will definitely come back to Sofitel Nusa Dua, in the hope that we will find better food at other restaurants such as Cucina or Kwee Zeen will have improved.

Un v≈ìu exauc√©! I was not prepared for this! He planed the trip to Bali and kept every detail secret. From the welcome to the following days, we are pampered. Even the weather is perfect. The staffs, Surya, Febri, and all of the waiters, Thumbs Up for you. You are amazing. The chefs in kitchen, another THANKS YOU. To the people we met even in the alleys, on the beach and all over, THANKS TO YOU. You made our anniversary an PERPETUAL SOUVENIR! ‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®

To celebrate our wedding anniversary, we decided to stay at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua and that was the best decision. From the moment of our arrival to the hotel until we checked out, we were treated like VIPs. No guest requests are too insignificant, the staff would do their best to fullfill them. Lisa at the club Millesime reception area is very helpful in answering all of our questions. We even discussed the details of our next holiday back at Sofitel Nusa Dua. The club attendants were all so wonderful; you could feel that they served the guests from the heart. Krisna, our room attendant did an exceptional job in making sure the room was cleaned and refreshed everytime we returned from outdoor activities. We had a very nice dinner at Toya beach bar & grill with a view to the ocean on our last night at the hotel. Our table was taken care of by Eka who was very friendly and energetic. The service was really efficient and professional. We can't wait for our next holiday with our kids at Sofitel Nusa Dua.

We arrived in Bali on Monday and stayed here at the Sofitel Nusa Dua!! Exceptional service, very friendly, very knowledgeable and go above and beyond. We had our family friend like a sister from Bali who came to visit us here with her 3 daughters and Meity assisted us with the utmost care with helping us figure out how they can come and have dinner with us as its my birthday holiday. I love it here and if I could I‚Äôd stay here again and again

Our stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua was simply awesome. From the warm hospitality to the exceptional service, every moment felt like luxury done right. The food was amazing, and the vibe was pure paradise. Perfect place to unwind and celebrate life. Can‚Äôt wait to return!
Hotel 5 stars which have a lot of good facilities, great rooms, kind and responsive services, private beach, feeding friendly squirrel every breakfast and delicious food

A Truly Memorable Family Stay ‚Äì Thanks to the Incredible Butler Team Our family of four stayed at the Sofitel Nusa Dua Beach from July 5th to 13th in a Club Mill√©sime room, and it was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment we arrived, the service was flawless ‚Äì made even more special by the team of butlers who looked after us throughout our stay: Edi, Yudi, Bagus, and Diah. Each of them was kind, humble, attentive, and genuinely dedicated to making our stay unforgettable. They went above and beyond in every way ‚Äì always anticipating our needs, offering thoughtful touches, and treating our family with warmth and care that felt so personal. Our children especially grew close to Edi, who had a beautiful way of connecting with them. On our final night, he came to say goodbye, and the moment he left, both our daughter and son burst into tears ‚Äì which in turn made my wife and I teary-eyed as well. It was such a raw and emotional moment that truly showed how special these people had become to us. While it was difficult to leave, we feel incredibly grateful to have been looked after by such beautiful souls. We can‚Äôt thank Edi, Yudi, Bagus, and Diah enough for their genuine care and impeccable service. Our family left with full hearts and unforgettable memories. Highly recommend this resort ‚Äì not just for the luxury, but for the people who make it extraordinary.

I decided to celebrate a family member's birthday in Bali and booked two rooms at Sofitel. Everything was perfect; from the upgrade granted to the birthday girl (including Club Millesime) to the kindness and availability of the staff. The staff helped us arrange a special welcome for the birthday girl, and she was very happy about it. Moreover, the hotel is by the beach, which was great for us to relax even more. As a cherry on the cake, we were granted a really late check-out. Sofitel standards are quite high everywhere, but the Nusa Dua Sofitel was a higher level. The staff is particularly well trained in being polite to the guests and trying to accommodate their requests.
spacious clean room. Friendly staff. Lovely beach. Accommodating facilities. Surely will come again

Fabulous stay for our Anniversary All who consider to stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua it will be an experience to remember. We can not say enough how our stay was amazing. Thank you to all staff and teams throughout the resort. We had two amazing butlers for most of the stay Yuri and Bayu. We miss you already. You really did get our needs. The Cucina restaurant is also well worth the experience. The food was amazing. Try the Seafood Gnochi it is the best i have eaten. For real. The resort is relaxed and with so many restaurants and beach activities. You can check in and not have to think till you leave. Also if the opportunity arises the club lounge is so worth the additional cost when you are booking your room. Hope this helps all
Fasilitas lengkap, utk hotel di nusa dua Bali......cukup menyenangkan.

A Perfect Family Getaway ‚Äì Unforgettable Experience at Sofitel Nusa Dua Bali. We recently returned from what was truly the most amazing family holiday we've ever had, and it was all thanks to the incredible experience at **Sofitel Nusa Dua Bali**. From the moment we arrived, everything exceeded our expectations. The location is unbeatable ‚Äî our villa was just a few meters from the beach, Club Mill√©sime, the gym, and breakfast areas, making it incredibly convenient for the whole family. The amenities were luxurious and thoughtfully designed, creating the perfect balance of relaxation and fun. Thank you, Sofitel, for creating such a magical experience for our family. We‚Äôre already looking forward to our next visit! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (5/5)

Well I got to tell you this hotel is amazing. The pools are amazing. The service is amazing. Rooms are gorgeous. And we had a date night just her and I and we had the lobster and the prime rib Angus from Australia. Amazing!. Their breakfast buffet. Wow top notch. 3 days here so far just it's been a beautiful time. We've had a busy week and a half so far in Indonesia and Australia. It's been go go go. It's nice to have a little unwind before we head to sudabaya Indonesia. Just a little relaxation before we get to concrete jungle. But we're really loving this place. It's so peaceful. The beach is beautiful. Gorgeous sunrise. We stayed in the same hotel chain in Australia in Darling harbor beautiful chain of hotels. I can't say that about the Sydney restaurant now is good. We had a pleasant stay

Our 3rd visit to this beautiful resort. The service was fantastic especially our room attendant (Widarta) who was the most helpful and friendly and thorough guy we‚Äôve ever encountered. The pools are great with plenty of comfortable chairs and food was delicious. Breakfast is busy but a highlight with so many options. We‚Äôd like to thank Amy for her attentiveness and we‚Äôll be back!
The hotel is spacious and exudes a serene, temple-like atmosphere. Its expansive gardens and stunning pools add to the overall beauty of the property.

Everyone should stay in this hotel. You won‚Äôt stay everywhere else. The hotel is very nice. Every staff is amazing, especially the gym staff. Agus greeted us every morning with his smile. We got to know Azril as well. He gave my kids boxing training. They enjoyed it so much and they had a blast! Thank you so much guys. We enjoyed the pool and the beach. We dined on the beach on our first day. The food was so good. As a gold member of the All Accor, we were upgraded to luxury room with a plunge pool. The room was spacious. That plunge pool was being used everyday to cool down in this weather. Thank you again and we will see you soon!

We had the most amazing time at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua! The hotel is absolutely stunning ‚Äì from the lush gardens to the elegant pools and the beautiful beachfront, everything is picture-perfect. You can really feel the thought and care that went into every detail. What impressed us the most, though, was the service. Even though the resort is quite large, the staff made us feel genuinely seen and cared for. Every interaction felt personal, warm, and sincere. It‚Äôs rare to find such a great mix of luxury and heartfelt hospitality ‚Äì but Sofitel truly delivers both. They also took care of special wishes and even surprised us with lovely touches to make our special occasion truly unforgettable. From the delicious breakfast to the relaxing spa and cozy dinner settings, everything was top-notch. And let‚Äôs not forget the signature Sofitel beds ‚Äì absolutely amazing! We haven‚Äôt slept that well in ages. A heartfelt thank you to the whole Sofitel team ‚Äì we‚Äôll always remember this special time. Terima kasih banyak ‚Äì sampai jumpa lagi! üå¥‚ú®

Perfect place to relax and not need to worry about where you‚Äôll be eating or what you‚Äôll be doing. Huge pool with plenty of beds, great restaurants and a beautiful beachfront. Service was also outstanding (as always in Bali) ü§çü§ç
Nice resort with good amenities. Service in general was good, but the staff need to work on communication skills.

flew in for a conference - short stay, service was faultless, staff were friendly and goes above and beyond to ensure all needs were met. I was lost getting to the conference venue and asked a member of staff, he took the time to walk me to the conference room although it was in the opposite direction to where he was going. I dropped my hair scrunchie in the conference on the last day, and returned to the desk in the evening to ask if the cleaning staff found it. Receptionist rang the housekeeping team who said they didn't find anything, the lady then took me into the room to look for it, although it was evening and she spotted it camouflaged next table leg, slightly covered by the black tablecloth. It wasn't an expensive item, it was the only hair tie i had with me, it wasn't a big deal if i lost it. So it was really heart warming that the receptionist took extra effort to help me locate something so small. deeply appreciate the high level of service and personal touch from every staff member. they took pride in what they do and were always smiling and happy to see you, every staff member i walked passed had a smile and greeting.

I love everything about this little paradise! The staff are so welcoming, from check in to dining to the hallways, there is always a warm smile everywhere you go ‚ò∫Ô∏è breakfast buffet was endless and delicious! The staff member Mega Kweezeen was very attentive ‚ò∫Ô∏è. The rooms are very nice, the beds are clouds, best sleep in a long time!

Absolutely loved this resort and would recommend to anyone considering a stay here. The pools were a standout, they went for days and surrounded the entire resort, the service, the cleanliness, the rooms and facilites, the restaurants, location, staff kindness...it was all superb. I will definitely stay here again one day if returning to Bali. Highly recommend!! Only drawback if i had to find one was that we felt the kids club appeared a little more focussed on little kids/toddlers and not so much aimed at those 7 and above so we didnt utlise that service as we'd hoped but our kids were not short on entertainment with the extensive pools, beach and activites about.

We stayed in the Luxury room of Sofitel, Nusa Dua. Loved our stay immensely. Even if service fell short at times, service recovery was prompt and satisfactory. Only grouse if we have to pick something is that breakfast buffet can get boring if you are stay is extended. Special shout-out to Niti, our housekeeper. She always set the room to exactly how we would like it.

My friends and I got food from the restaurant located by the beach. The food was exquisite, the lamb tasted amazing and the Choc Forest was divine. Erik our server was also really attentive and helpful. Price is more expensive than some but worth the price. Would definitely recommend.
Best Hotel at Nusa Dua area Friendly staff, kids friendly Food at all restaurant is very Good taste Will come back again See you soon üëçüòç

We had an amazing stay! The rooms were spacious, and the beach access and pools made our kids incredibly happy. The food was excellent with lots of variety and great taste. We had dinner at kwee zen and cucina. Both resto had varities of delicious foods. We also enjoyed a relaxing massage at the spa‚Äîspecial thanks to Ms. Evi and Ms. Ega for taking such good care of us. While we relaxed, the kids had fun with the treasure hunt game at the kids‚Äô club. The gym and cardio area were top-notch. Overall, a 10/10 experience. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back! A perfect place to enjoy the beauty of Bali

I love the Sofitel but one of my fave parts of this hotel is the Italian restaurant. Omg this place is amazing the food is incredible I‚Äôve been here so many times and everytime I come it‚Äôs seriously amazing. The staff is also incredible Thankyou to our team that served us Yoga and Agus they were amazing. Seriously the best ever.

Great resort for the most of it. Although most of the staff were just so, so lovely, I have to make special mention to certain staff - Sugi, at the day spa was very attentive and her experience and knowledge in providing the services I had were exceptional. Resmana (sorry if spelling isn't quite right), did a perfect job in setting up our floating breakfast. His attention to detail could not be faulted. Yulyastika, at Toya Restaurant also gave us wonderful and attentive service - thank you so much. The food and view from this restaurant also was on point! The resort had a great vibe and atmosphere. You can find both quiet and action at this resort. Great for young, old, couples and families. As you can see most of my comments are very positive and I am sorry to end on a sour note, but it needs to be mentioned - We bought a package that included access to the Club Lounge that included afternoon tea as well as canapes and cocktails. This is no reflection on the wait staff - they were always courteous and friendly. However the replenishment of food was very poor. Every day we were there it was always running out and very, very slow to be topped up again.There were only 2 hot dishes (both at afternoon tea and evening canapes). They must know how many guests had club lounge access and should cater accordingly. Not only was it the hot food, but even the crackers, cheese etc. Also glasses if you just wanted a soft drink or mineral water. You often had to ask a wait staff for a glass and then wait for them to get you one. Again, no reflection on wait staff. Management should 'manage' this and eyeball the area. Also, staff at the reception desk of the Club Lounge could be taught to 'up' their game. Reception staff in the general area were much better. You would think the best staff would be employed to work at the Club Lounge. We rang up and asked for a late check out and I received a message via WhatsApp, telling us that we just needed to present our room cards to reception and they would update it. We went to Club Lounge Reception and was told by the girl on the desk that we would have to wait till her colleague came back to update card. We just went down to the main foyer and the reception staff there updated the cards in a millisecond. Why couldn't the girl on club lounge reception do it? Then, after we checked out and paid our bill at the Club Lounge Reception, we wanted to wait half an hour in the lounge and just have a cup of coffee or tea (as they said they provide all day refreshments), till our pick up to the airport arrived. We were told we weren't allowed as we had now checked out or she would have to check with her manager. If we had known that, we would have had our cup of coffee and then checked out. I mean really....if you pay that price for club lounge access!! We were dumbfounded and left the lounge as we weren't going to plea for a cup of coffee and sitting there for half an hour. I later went back to provide feedback! They said there was miscommunication. I've played it back in my head and we definitely said we just wanted to kill half an hour in there. Anyway, that's my rant. Some guests are well to do and expect exceptional service in a Club Lounge and for some guests, it's a very special treat, but also expect special treatment if you are paying for it. This is a 5 star resort and greater attention to finer details needs to be a given! I recently heard a quote - Luxury is having more than what you asked for, given to you without asking. I think management should take this on board and train reception staff and supervisors (food & beverage) at Club Lounge accordingly.

Hotel fantastic room unbelievable lady who's cleaning my room in 3311 Keeps the room cleaned to a very high standard ,always willing to help with anything ,we went to the restaurant Kwee Zeen our waiter Devayana was outstanding my wife likes ala carte but the buffet was on ,he gave us a menu and accommodated us which was fantastic ,this man was fantastic he made my wife very happy so if senior management is reading this all I can say is you have a fantastic team working for you we've stayed in loads of hotels and I can honestly say this one is a gem and I wouldn't hesitate telling my colleagues about this hotel,Thankyou Sofitel and all the team

We recently stayed at Sofitel and experienced both the Prestige Suite and the Luxury Room, giving us a comprehensive view of the hotel‚Äôs offerings. 1. Prestige Suite The Prestige Suite was spacious and beautifully designed ‚Äî we truly enjoyed the size and comfort. However, we encountered a few issues during our stay. The tile flooring can be dangerously slippery when stepping out of the shower or bathtub; my wife nearly slipped. Additionally, we noticed cockroaches in the room, which was concerning. The suite was located at the far end of the beach, making it a long walk back from the main hotel facilities. Being on the second floor without a nearby lift also meant climbing stairs frequently, which was inconvenient. 2. Luxury Room We later moved to a Luxury Room on the ground floor next to the lift for easier access. While more conveniently located, this room was significantly smaller, and sound insulation was a major issue. We could clearly hear noises from upstairs, adjoining rooms, and even doorbells and doors closing nearby, which affected our rest. Breakfast Experience We tried breakfast twice at Kwee Zeen but were disappointed both times. On one occasion, a guest screamed upon seeing cockroaches running near the fresh food area. Some food items were not fresh and had a noticeable odor. After that, we chose to dine at the Club Lounge instead, where the quality of food and service was considerably better. Checkout Experience Despite holding Accor Platinum status and confirming a 4 PM late checkout upon arrival, our room key stopped working after breakfast on our final day. When I approached the front desk at 12:20 PM, I was told I had to check out by 1 PM because I hadn‚Äôt requested late checkout the night before ‚Äî something I have never encountered at any other Accor property. The rushed packing and abrupt end to our stay disrupted our plans and left us with a poor final impression. Safety Concerns The lobby floor can be hazardous when wet. During one cleaning session, water pooled on the tiles, I was almost fell over, but my young son wasn't lucky, he slipped and hit his head on the floor. There was no warning signage coming from the room side, only the sinage coming from the lobby, which was quite alarming. The staff who were cleaning just stopped the machine but they didn't warn us about how slippery the floor was. Dining & Accor Discount Issues Another issue we noticed across multiple restaurants was inconsistency with the Accor Plus dining discount. Staff would take a photo of our membership card and state a 50% discount applied, but they failed to mention that children‚Äôs meals were excluded. Moreover, the discount often wasn‚Äôt applied correctly on the bill, requiring us to request adjustments and present our card again. This happened more than once, indicating a lack of training or attention to detail. Overall Impression While the Sofitel property has its strengths, especially in room design and Club Lounge service, the inconsistencies in service quality, cleanliness, safety, and management of loyalty privileges left us disappointed. There is clear room for improvement, particularly in hospitality training, hygiene standards, and honoring elite member benefits.

Our family stayed at Sofitel Nusa Dua on our recent (and first) trip to Bali. The resort was fantastic; clean, well laid out, great pools and restaurants as well as first class service. They made our trip very relaxed and comfortable.

We had a one week stay in Sofitel with our 8 year old daughter. We loved it and she did as well. Hotel and garden and pools are really beautiful and at the same time finctional. Kids pool is great and kids loved it. Rooms are large and nice. Cleaning service is great. Restaurants offer good variety and we didn‚Äôt feel like eating same thing twice. We loved it!
The best stay ever, check in by Asri and the room was very clean from Asih Thank you Sofitel balo

Clean and tidy room with friendly staff. The hotel was beautiful. Spacious swimming pool but no swimming after 7pm. We had our dinner and breakfast at KWEE ZEEN Nusa Dua. The food was delicious with great variety. We had the beach spa massage which was a terrible experience. It was windy and had no privacy. The masseuse asked us to take our clothes off in the public area without closing the blinds. They didn‚Äôt wash our feet before messaging from our feet to our face. Loud music and people walking by during the whole massage. We couldn‚Äôt relax at all‚Ä¶üòµ

Our stay was fantastic, with excellent service from check-in to check-out. We were particularly impressed by the friendly and helpful front office, Food & Beverage, and housekeeping teams. The room temperature was perfect. We will definitely be returning in the future. The only area for improvement we noted was at Club Mill√©sime. The air conditioning seemed to need attention, as it was quite warm during both afternoon tea and Ap√©ro Chic. Thank you, and have a great day!

From the moment we arrived, we were captivated by the impeccable location of Sofitel, perfectly situated for relaxation. The hotel's amenities exceeded expectations, from the beautifully designed rooms to the spa and gourmet dining options. Every detail was thoughtfully curated to ensure a seamless and luxurious stay. What truly set this experience apart was the outstanding customer service! The staff went above and beyond, anticipating our needs before we even had to ask, making us feel genuinely valued and cared for. Every moment of our stay was effortless, allowing us to fully unwind and indulge in the elegance and comfort that Sofitel is known for. A true sanctuary of luxury and hospitality‚Äîwe cannot wait to return!

The room was big enough for us 2 adults and 2 kids, was clean and bed was comfortable. The pool was huge and not overcrowded. Beach was right at the door step. There were bicycles , balls for loan as well for free. Buffet spread for breakfast was amazing, we went for the noodles kiosk daily! Lastly; the service from everybody was beyond expectation, every staff was so courteous and helpful. it was mind blowing that all the staff was well mannered and polite. It was the best hotel out of our 3 hotels in Bali, we will definitely be back!

I stayed at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Hotel for 1 night. In terms of security and comfort the hotel environment was very good. In terms of the room was also clean, spacious and very comfortable, I really like the condition of the room, the design of the room, the view from the room, the placement of furniture in the room, and etc. I was also grateful and thankful because the hotel has provided a non-slippery mat that makes My Mom more comfortable when taking a shower. Regarding the location, it was a bit far from the crowd because Sofitel Nusa Dua Beach Hotel is in a separate complex with quite good security (must go through 2x inspection gates) 1 thing that would be a note in my memory. I just realized that Sofitel Nusa Dua Beach did not provide Room Service for Dinner and there was no Breakfast when Easter (Black Out Date), I do not know whether the information was conveyed to me because I stayed using a complementary voucher from All Accor or it was generally like that, because when I checked out (Easter day) around 10.30 - 11.00 WIB, I found many foreign tourists arriving at the lobby of the Sofitel Nusa Dua Beach hotel and according to information from the hotel staff, some of them wanted to order Brunch. I really regret that happened to us, considering that my mother and I deliberately did not bring food from outside because we wanted to taste the hotel's culinary delights. However, precisely because we stayed with a complementary voucher from ALL Accor we were given information that we could not order dinner in the room, please go directly to the restaurant. And considering that we checked in quite tired because we were stuck in traffic on the way from Tanah Lot to the hotel (it was already 7:00 at night), we were too lazy to go out again to find food and in the morning we hurriedly packed up and checked out early to have breakfast outside. I have stayed in 5-star hotels like Sofitel Nusa Dua Beach several times , but it was the first experience Room Service for dinner was not available and Breakfast was also closed considering Easter (black out date). I intended to ask further when I saw the menu instructions on the TV and the menu book in the room regarding breakfast and room service options, but in the end I canceled that intention.

Mila was fantastic making sure I had everything I needed. Her work was exemplary and my room was thoroughly cleaned everyday. She was kind and had a great sense of humour. Arta took very good yoga classes and Nelson was our Concierge who went out of his way to help us. I would recommend staying at The Nusa Dua Sofitel as it was very beautiful and our family had a wonderful holiday. Everyone was so friendly it was like a home away from home.

This was our third stay with looking to a fourth this year with all family members. The hotel is consistent with great breakfast and comfortable rooms, this stay we found in room dining more efficient and cleanliness of room was very good. Nurse on duty was excellent and provided professional and welcome treatment to my wife.

The Sofitel Nusa Dua was an amazing place to stay; aesthetically, an amazing layout and design, the facilities, the enormous & opulent rooms and the beautiful staff. Would fully recommend it to anyone staying in that beautiful part of the world. FABULOUS

Sofitel is a great hotel,with spacious rooms and great hospitality services. Their milesime club is worth the fame for their hospitality and services. The check in is going smooth, michelle in front service and lestari on the club milesime help for a smooth checkin, kudos. Room is spacious and comfy, they have complete amenities with loccitane toiletries which is awesome. The bathubs also spacious and we can enjoy n relax with the free seasalt or bubble bath of our chosen one. Breakfast varieties is super,they have a lot of dishes in kwee zeen, but if you don't like the crowd and have access to club M then you can try it's also awesome. I would recommend this for a vacations with kids. My kids happy spending the time staycation here. Worth the value and money given.
Such a great time with the fam at Sofitel Nusa Dua this October! Everything was perfect ‚Äî from the room to the service. Definitely coming back!

From the moment we checked in I felt like royalty. The staff sat us in a beautiful lounge, offered us cold towels and juice while they sorted all the check in and luggage. Upon entering our room, they had two teddies as gifts for our children which was such a lovely touch. The kids were given a hotel passport that took them on a journey around the resort offering free food, drinks and manicures. The kids club was like an Australian daycare, setup with lots of carers to watch the kids so we could have some alone time and truly enjoy having a break. Our room came with a Butler, who would introduce themselves every morning and afternoon making sure our stay was enjoyable offering to help in any way. The daily breakfast buffet was so delicious!! lots of choices from different types of foods so everyone had something they enjoyed. The massive bed was extremely comfortable which is a make or break for hotels, I didn't want to get out of bed! The beach front restaurant was beautiful, we had our mums 60th party there and it was magical watching my parents dance with their grandkids in the sand. I couldn't recommend this resort enough, especially for families. When I return to Bali, it will be back here!

Sofitel Nusa Dua offers a refined blend of modern French elegance and Balinese charm. From the grand lobby to the sprawling pool and beautifully landscaped grounds, the entire resort exudes majesty and polish. As an Accor Platinum member, I truly appreciated the warm welcome and status recognition at check-in. Although the hotel was fully booked and I didn‚Äôt receive a room upgrade, the staff made every effort to ensure a smooth and pleasant stay. One of the highlights was the Club Mill√©sime lounge‚Äîa quiet, elegant space where service was attentive and the food consistently delicious. From breakfast to evening canap√©s, every bite felt thoughtfully prepared and beautifully presented. A perfect place to unwind in comfort and privacy. The rest of the resort lived up to Sofitel‚Äôs high standards: a spectacular pool, well-equipped fitness center, and sleek, comfortable rooms with tasteful design elements. Whether relaxing on the grounds or heading out to explore, everything felt effortless and indulgent. Despite the full occupancy, Sofitel Nusa Dua delivered a luxurious and relaxing stay, with heartfelt service, fantastic food, and a setting that feels both grand and personal.
A beautiful location with stunning golden beaches in a ‚Äògated suburb‚Äô. No traffic and very few hawkers. Staff were wonderful.
Had a wonderful stay in a Prestige Suite with Club Milliseme access. Room was magnificent and beyond our wildest expectations. Only wished we had of booked for one or two nights more!!

My family and I have been regulars at Sofitel Brunch for years. I always make sure that my travel dates include a Sunday so that we can enjoy the all you can eat brunch. Beautiful location with attention to detail paired with excellent and personalised service, makes this brunch spot a necessary luxury. Thank you Yoga, Teguh, Chef Patrizia, and the Sofitel team for always looking after us.

We recently returned to Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua to celebrate our 10-year anniversary, and once again, it absolutely lived up to all our expectations ‚Äì and more. Just like our previous stay, everything was flawless from the moment we arrived. A heartfelt thank you to Andrie Kapitan, the wonderful Front Office Manager and the front office team, for the very generous room upgrade ‚Äì our suite was stunning, spacious, and beautifully presented. It truly made our anniversary feel extra special. We‚Äôd also love to express our appreciation to the incredible staff across the entire resort ‚Äì from the bell desk, reception, housekeeping, to the bar and restaurant teams. Every single staff member we encountered was warm, professional, and genuinely caring. While I unfortunately don‚Äôt know everyone‚Äôs name, please know that you all made a lasting impression ‚Äì you‚Äôre the soul of the resort. Special thanks as well to Putra from the Wedding Sales team, who kindly took the time to show us the venue and walk us through all the details about the wedding packages. Also thanks to the lovely spa and massage team for their amazing work specially Dewi. Thank you so much! And of course ‚Äì the food! Absolutely amazing, especially at Cucina. The flavours, the presentation, the atmosphere ‚Äì everything was spot on. Thank you again to everyone at Sofitel Bali for making our stay so memorable. We can‚Äôt wait to return.
Wonderful resort. Great F&B, Cucina is excellent, great service from Suci.

Dhea as Guest Experience Team She was very nice and kind, helped us organize everything so that our trip would be wonderful. She was amazing and very attentive , she worked so hard to make this vacation truly special.

Everything went really well except the last day of me stay. Extended check out to 4pm but every hourly power trip. The last was bathing half way and no electric plus phone is not working at all to connect to front desk. Apart from this, warn welcome by Sofitel upon arrival and staff real friendly and efficient actually. Never failed to attend to us as I have two old folks with me. Room is real spacious and gracefully maintained. Bed is SO big and comfy. Linen and towels are good quality kind and new. At least in 2024. Room with a nice view facing sea, Sitting at the balcony, listening to the sea breeze and looking beach side massage, very relaxing. A wide variety of tv channels and full amenity toiletries provided. Bath tub is huge too with complimentary bubble bath and bath salt provided. Actually not much options of asean option restaurants, mostly western. However, Room service has both western and asean food. Food taste not too bad, portion just right. Free shuttle service to bali collection on a hourly basis but first come first service basis. Huge hotel and they provided buggy service within hotel premises. All these are plus point after a tired day. Still I enjoyed my stay with Sofitel despite the hiccups which I was told is entire bali power trip. So I don‚Äôt blame them.

The location of this luxurious hotel is great with direct beach access. The luxury factor is evident at every place, from the lobby, to the common areas, to the pool, to the beach dining, to the beach amenities and definitely in the room and the private swimming pool that we got! The only thing lacking I found is water activities in swimming pool for 6-12 age group which my kids thoroughly enjoyed at Movenpick Bali Jimbaran. Barring this small aspect, everything was great at this hotel.
one of the best hotel in bali for family staycation. they have big pools, complete facilities and activities to fill your time through the day. Overall best experience and definitely will come back.

Unforgettable Anniversary & Family Stay Truly Exceptional Service at Sofitel We recently stayed at Sofitel to celebrate our wedding anniversary, which also happened to fall on Father‚Äôs Day and we were completely blown away by the experience. Eventhough we had slightly disagreement through an email with the Reservation team and Concierge but it's all paid off. A special shout out to Edi from Housekeeping, who prepared the most thoughtful surprise in our room. It was beautifully arranged, with such personal touches that truly warmed our hearts. Every day, our room was immaculate and inviting, and Edi‚Äôs quiet dedication made our stay feel truly special. Also, a big thank you to May from the Front Office. Traveling with two young daughters can be a handful, but May went above and beyond to make sure everything was smooth right from the start. Her kindness, patience, and attention to detail made us feel like we were staying with family. From start to finish, the entire Sofitel team made our stay memorable. The pool was a big hit (our kids didn‚Äôt want to leave!), and the sunrise views were simply breathtaking truly a perfect escape. We‚Äôd also like to extend our appreciation to Annisa and the Guest Experience team, as well as the restaurant staff especially Micellyn, Rama, the gentleman who served our coffee, and the kitchen staff behind the delicious meals. We may not remember every name, but we certainly remember the warmth and hospitality. Thank you for the beautiful memories. We‚Äôll definitely be back! Warm regards, Gusti Ayu Kartini and Family

We had a two night stay at this resort. The place is beautiful and super clean. We had most of our meals at the hotel restaurants. The Italian restaurant while very nice is quite expensive. However staff at the hotel, restaurants and amenities are super helpful and nice. Always with a smile, a polite greeting. A special shout out to our server Sinta at our last meal at the hotel.

Exceptional Dining Experience at Kwee Zeen! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê I recently had the pleasure of dining at Kwee Zeen restaurant in the Sofitel Nusa Dua Beach Resort, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of outstanding, thanks to Yudi Permana! From the moment we arrived, Yudi greeted us with a warm smile and made us feel right at home. The ambiance of the restaurant was lovely, but it was Yudi's attentive service that truly elevated our dining experience. He checked in on us regularly, ensuring we had everything we needed without being intrusive. His genuine passion for providing excellent service shone through, making our evening feel special. The food itself was exquisite! Each dish was beautifully presented and bursting with flavour. If you're looking for a memorable dining experience in Bali, I highly recommend visiting Kwee Zeen and asking for Yudi Permana. His exceptional service and dedication to guest satisfaction make all the difference. Thank you, Yudi, for a wonderful evening! We can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Very large resort but unless you tipped service was not great. Check in took a long time, not getting our room but getting served in general was about 30min+. Then we didn‚Äôt get showed to our room just pointed in the general direction and for a large resort was a bit overwhelming on first arrival. Some of the food was fantastic some not so great and if you are using luxury escape vouchers through their deal you have limitations unless you pay extra. We also felt that we were treated less using our vouchers. As the saying goes money talks. The resort is starting to show its age, our room smelt wet/mouldy and had an air purifier in it so it is a known problem. Our room was clean and well presented but we did have to ask for our sheets to be changed on 4th day. Was very hard to communicate with staff especially reception as they don‚Äôt understand English that well. Overall we wouldn‚Äôt recommend this resort for the price, it is a relaxing resort with some beautiful grounds and great access to beach but be willing to pay extra to receive good service.

My husband and I had a great time in Sofitel. We went in the second week in June, after staying in Seminyak. The hotel and the location were amazing, the hotel was beautiful and vast. As√≠h, our room cleaner was fantastic and always kept our room spotless. The beach was beautiful, unfortunately not enough sun loungers though. My main points of contention was that there wasn‚Äôt any A.C in the breakfast room, so every morning, it was uncomfortably humid and there wasn‚Äôt enough standing fans in the room.

The staff are incredibly friendly, helpful and efficient. They are so welcoming and keen to help in any way. The staff are very attentive to kids. Sinta, Mega, Suardana and Darma in particular from Kweezeen were wonderful and so helpful. Catur and Vivin at Toya by the beach were fantastic with service and personality. Kids club is great for young kids and breakfast buffet was 10/10.

From the moment we arrived at Sofitel Nusa Dua, we were immersed in a world of luxury, warmth, and impeccable service. Our six-night stay was nothing short of exceptional, from the indulgent Sofitel Luxury Spa to the breathtaking Toya Beach Restaurant, where every meal felt like a culinary escape. What truly sets this resort apart is its people‚Äîevery member of the staff exudes warmth and hospitality, making us feel welcome at every turn. While we had a couple of minor complications with our room, Duty Manager Selly went above and beyond to ensure everything was rectified swiftly. Her dedication and personal touch truly elevated our experience, and we are deeply grateful for her efforts. Sofitel Nusa Dua has left a lasting impression on us, and we are already looking forward to returning‚Äîthis time with our entire family, so they, too, can experience this slice of paradise. Thank you to the entire team for making our stay so memorable. Until next time!

We chose this hotel for our honeymoon, and it turned out to be a great decision. The hotel pool and the beach were romantic and perfect for having a wonderful time together. In particular, OKA from the concierge team took care of us with great attention, which made us feel truly special. If we visit Bali again, I would definitely choose Sofitel once more.

Wanted a relaxing holiday and that's exactly what we got at the Sofitel Nusa Dua. The facilities were great and the staff sensational. Ideally located with easy access to Bali Collection and other local attractions.

We loved every moment of our stay. From the moment we were greeted in the Lobby to the warmest greeting at the Lounge, we were looked after by the amazing staff. All staff were very attentive remembering our names and always went above and beyond to ensure we had a great experience. Our upgrade to a pool swim out room and late check out was very much appreciated and we were very happy.

Our experience so far as been exceptional with 5 star quality rooms, food and pool facilities with amazing service. A notable experience I had this morning was at breakfast at KweeZween, included in our package, which encompasses a market-style structure with different stations of high quality food. We were served by Mega who was so kind and even patiently taught us Balinese. She was very attentive to our needs and made us feel very welcome!
Really felt welcome and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua. Left feeling great and extremely rested.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Sofitel Nusa Dua, and I must say, it was an unforgettable experience from start to finish. Every aspect of the resort, from the lounge and restaurant to the kids‚Äô play area and pool, was thoughtfully designed to provide maximum comfort, luxury, and enjoyment. Lounge Experience The lounge at Sofitel Nusa Dua is a perfect blend of elegance and relaxation. Upon entering, I was immediately impressed by the sophisticated d√©cor and the calming ambiance. The seating was plush and comfortable, ideal for unwinding after a day of exploring. The staff were exceptionally attentive and friendly, always ready with a warm smile and prompt service. The selection of beverages and light snacks was impressive, featuring both local flavors and international favorites. Whether for a casual coffee or an evening cocktail, the lounge provided a serene environment to relax and socialize. Yuli and Tai at front desk were amazing. Kristina and Mat at minestrone club were best, Restaurant Dining Dining at Sofitel Nusa Dua was nothing short of spectacular. Dinesh the chef understood our veg needs properly. The restaurant offered a diverse menu that catered to a variety of tastes, from authentic Balinese dishes to international cuisine. Each meal was a culinary delight, beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. The fresh ingredients and creative combinations truly showcased the chef‚Äôs expertise. The ambiance was elegant yet inviting, with attentive staff who ensured that every dining experience was memorable. Breakfast buffets were particularly impressive, offering a wide array of options to start the day right. Kids Play Area Traveling with children can sometimes be challenging, but the kids‚Äô play area at Sofitel Nusa Dua made the stay incredibly enjoyable for my little ones. The play area was safe, clean, and creatively designed to keep children entertained for hours. It featured a variety of toys, games, and activities that stimulated their imagination and energy. What I appreciated most was the staff‚Äôs genuine care and supervision, allowing parents to relax knowing their children were in good hands. It was a wonderful space that balanced fun and safety perfectly. Pool Facilities The pool area at Sofitel Nusa Dua was a true highlight of the resort. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, the pools offered a refreshing escape from the tropical heat. The water was crystal clear and well-maintained, with ample loungers and shaded areas for relaxation. Whether I wanted to swim laps or simply lounge by the water with a cocktail, the pool area provided the perfect setting. The poolside service was impeccable, with attentive staff ensuring that drinks and snacks were always within reach. It was an oasis of tranquility and luxury. Final Thoughts My stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua was an extraordinary experience that exceeded all expectations. The combination of luxurious amenities, exceptional service, and family-friendly facilities made it a perfect destination for both relaxation and fun. I highly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a sophisticated yet welcoming getaway in Bali. Whether you‚Äôre traveling solo, as a couple, or with family, Sofitel Nusa Dua promises a memorable and delightful stay. I look forward to returning soon!

Great place with well-trained professional staff. Verified as One of the Finest Properties in the World (by Forbes - 2025) in creating an extraordinary people and services. Shout to Wikan who‚Äôs currently on job training in Kwee Zeen, you‚Äôre doing a great job! Kudos to all the staff (both back of house and front of house).üëèüèª

The staff are what make this hotel so special. From the gardeners, the pool staff, cleaners, waiters, to management. Every staff member was amazing. Yes the room was looking a bit tired, with broken tiles, but they were spotless and clean. The food at all the dining options was beautiful. You need to promote your day spa more and celebrate your win of 2024!. All the guest that I talked with had no idea that they had won such award. The day spa was next level and could understand why they had won this incredible award.
Sofitel Nusa Dua was a very clean and beautiful resort. The location was perfect for our Nusa Dua stay. The staff were very friendly; the breakfast was the best I've ever had.
The Sofitel Nusa Dua is like heaven on earth. Service, staff, location, pool, food and the beach is perfect. A real 5 star hotel.

Our family had a fantastic holiday at Sofitel Nusa Dua. The resort is beautiful, but it was the staff who made the experience truly special. A huge thank you to Yusa and everyone who looked after us ‚Äî always warm, friendly and going out of their way to help. Their genuine care and attention made our stay effortless and so enjoyable. We felt truly welcomed every single day. Highly recommend and can‚Äôt wait to come back!

I had a deeply disappointing experience at Sofitel Nusa Dua, which ultimately led me to check out before the end of my stay. The property feels outdated and in need of serious refurbishment ‚Äî it certainly does not meet the expectations of a 5-star resort. Nearly every amenity came with an additional charge, which was not clearly communicated upfront. On top of that, all prices were listed before tax, making costs feel misleading. For a resort under the Sofitel name, I expected a much higher standard of quality, service, and transparency.

Excellent Stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua We had an amazing stay at Sofitel Nusa Dua! The hotel is beautiful, clean, and well-maintained, with a lush green territory that creates a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. The service was top-notch, and the staff was always friendly and welcoming, making our experience even more enjoyable. The pool and beach area were comfortable and well-maintained, perfect for relaxation. The food was delicious, with excellent breakfast options that offered a great variety of dishes. A special highlight of our stay was the Club Millesime, which provided an exceptional experience. Overall, we highly recommend Sofitel Nusa Dua to anyone looking for a luxurious and enjoyable stay in Bali. We would definitely return!

The hotel was so amazing! Firstly we had a plunge pool right outside our hotel, secondly the people there were extremely friendly and welcoming to us, thirdly right outside the hotel is a beautiful beach. The restaurant is also huge and has some delicious food. They provided really nice toiletries, the brand (LOCCITANE) and it smelled awesome. The beds and the bathroom were really big as well. The price was a bit much but it was totally worth it. Overall I definitely recommend it.
Mohon maaf saya kasih bintang 1 saya gojek nganter minuman saya titipkan dilobby tidak disampaikan ke costumer sampai saya ke suspend

An excellent stay overall with exceptional and prompt service. The property is beautiful and well appointed, and most notably very calm and serene throughout all the spaces. Special thanks to Widiarta for facilitating an enjoyable and fun Balinese cooking class.

We had a fantastic stay at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua Beach Resort as a Chinese family of five for three nights. The experience was absolutely wonderful‚Äîperfect for a relaxing and enjoyable family trip. The room was comfortable, the facilities were excellent, and the service was top-notch. A special thank you to Dwipa for his warm hospitality and attentive service. He made our stay even more pleasant with his kindness and professionalism. Highly recommend this resort, and we will definitely be back in the future!

Great hotel with very nice service - especially the gentlemen working in the lobby (especially Panda) and Eka who works on the beach bar deserve praise-Nothing is impossible for them, they are incredibly nice and hard-working! In general, you can feel special here - everyone cares about the convenience and comfort of the guests. Delicious breakfasts - you can find cuisine from all over the world here and another plus is the possibility of making fresh juices for breakfast. I dream of coming back

I am writing this review regarding the restaurant of the Sofitel. We received outstanding service by Sadia, who made sure that we were well taken care of. Truly a hospitality professional. The view over the beach is spectacular and the food and drinks were delicious. I can particularly recommend the wines from Cape Discovery, the Merlot/Cabernet and the Ros√©. Very enjoyable and of course local. Highly recommend a visit here for a lovely evening. Thanks again, Sadia and Sofitel.
Makan malam yang menyenangkan di sofitel , kweezeen , banyak pilihan makanan , staff nya ramah , pelayanan nya bagus , terimakasih untuk , Widi , hendra , alit , ratnada

First bad impression. When arrived at hotel around 1.30 pm, must wait about 25 minutes just to register and being inform that the room not ready yet, even i'm a gold member which is has benefit for early check in. Finally at 3.15 pm got sms inform the room is ready, and when i came to front office, the front office staff didn't explain anything about the resort even 1 facility in hotel, the staff name is michele. When request late check out until 1.30 pm, they only give until 1pm.

Staff were so lovely. We had butler service with our room and they were excellent. Always checking in to see if we needed anything and so kind to our kids. The property itself is lovely in most parts but some areas are dated and in need of a clean/update. Our room was massive but again, a little damp smelling and showing signs of use and age. Would definitely stay again. Big thanks to butler Edi for taking such good care of us.
We had a wonderful experience. Great service overall especially check in/check out as well as communication from the Luxury concierge department prior to arrival.

Really disappointed with my experience in this hotel, which is unlike anything I have experienced at a 'high end' hotel before. We were checked in by Ricky, whose service and demeanour was outstanding. He was kind, friendly and helpful. Unfortunately that was the highlight of our two-night stay. We requested some washing up liquid to clean our baby's bottles - this was denied initially as 'something they just do not have'; when it was pointed out that they must have this to clean dishes in the kitchen, the story changed from 'this is something we do not provide', to 'this is not safe for babies' to 'it goes against our standard operating procedures to provide this'. The receptionist even suggested (at 10 at night) 'oh you should go out and buy some' - a service worth paying thousands for indeed (!). The final straw was after it was requested, and we were told we would receive an update, somebody knocked three times on my door at 10pm despite us explicitly telling reception not to do this, that the baby was asleep, and because of them we have no way of feeding her milk if she wakes up. She did indeed wake up with the knocking and would not be settled without her milk as we only had dirty bottles. We have stayed in a number of hotels around the world and never experienced anything like this - the excuses, the lack of helpfulness and just overall the stubborness and unwillingness. Something so basic that could have helped us out, and no real reason for not being willing to do so. Will not be back.

Worst Hotel Experience in Bali This was the worst hotel out of the three we stayed at during our trip ‚Äî Ayana and Alaya in Ubud were far better in every way. Service was poor from the start. Staff didn‚Äôt greet guests, check-in was slow, and even after it was done, our room wasn‚Äôt ready. We came back after 3 hours and still had to wait another 25 minutes just to get the key. The hotel either doesn‚Äôt have enough staff or they‚Äôre just poorly managed. Only two people were handling check-ins while three others stood around opening doors and serving drinks and even that was slow~!!! took 10min to get our welcome drink ‚Äî not acceptable. Breakfast was another letdown ‚Äî overcrowded and low quality. Sadly, I also had stomach issues and diarrhea after our stay, which speaks to the hygiene standards. Would definitely not recommend. Major disappointment!!!
Had fantastic service from Adnayana at Kwee Zen breakfast buffet. Buffet was great with a huge range of foods and food styles. Definitely recommend it and service from Adnayana. Ross Brisbane

This is my second stay at Sofitel Bali Nusa Dua this year, and once again, it exceeded expectations. This time, I was also involved in organizing an event at the hotel, and I must say the banqueting team was exceptionally professional, attentive, and supportive throughout. A special thanks to Ibu Lucky and Pak Alip for their dedication and seamless coordination ‚Äî everything ran smoothly from start to finish. I also deeply appreciate Ibu Amy for her thoughtful assistance with the room arrangements, which made our stay even more comfortable. Thank you to the entire Sofitel team for the warm hospitality. Looking forward to returning again soon!

It was our 5th time staying here. This venue is our family's favourite and always happy with all services provided. The restaurant is also a gem, special thanks to Wangi who served us for dinner. We will definitely come back again soon.
I stayed Sofitel 2nights with my family. During the days, I had breakfast in Kweezeen. All foods are delicious also all staffs are kind.
It was wonderful experience and great service Always greeting you politly and smile Thanks to Yulyastika bc he took care of us when we enjoyed in Toya restaurant

My fianc√© and I were booked to attend the Sofitel in mid August and my fianc√© has sadly had a motorbike accident resulting in 2 surgeries, weeks in hospital and a long rehabilitation process. Unable to make our booking I had tried reaching out to the hotel to ask if we could simply move our booking, more than happy to pay more to cover a change in rate and were met with the disappointing message that whilst they were sorry they would not allow us to change our booking date. Whilst I am aware that we booked with a no cancellation policy, I was not asking to cancel the booking or asking for a refund or compensation of any kind. I simply wanted to move our booking to later in the year so that would could finally have some downtime in what has been an incredibly hard time for us. To be met with we completely understand how disappointing and stressful it must be to we inform you that the terms and conditions associated with your booking remain applicable - even after sending documentation of hospital stays and surgery info highlighting the extent of my fianc√©'s severe injuries; is nothing short of heart-breaking. We have stayed at many other Sofitel branches before and have always been so happy with the service; one of the main reasons we booked to stay here when visiting Bali. We are incredibly disappointed in the Sofitel and will not be staying at the chain in the future.

Amazing so amazing recommend highly the service people are so wonderful and nice and the food is delicious and the hotel room is fabulous. Loved it very much. and the set up is fabulous and Vivin was absolutely wonderful The best server
Great people. Best staffs. Lovely club lounge. Room was little dated. Need refurbishment. Pool was excellent including the food and breakfast. Will definitely stay again.

My stay at Sofitel Bali was absolutely unforgettable! I had the pleasure of staying in a luxury pool access room, and it truly exceeded all expectations. Waking up and being able to step directly into the pool was such a unique and indulgent experience. The room was spacious, elegantly designed, and offered the perfect blend of comfort and style. The resort itself is stunning, and the staff provided impeccable service throughout my stay. Every meal was a culinary delight, and the overall atmosphere was pure relaxation. I‚Äôm already looking forward to my next visit!

Enjoy a lot in the hotel with excellent service by butler Nicky & Diah. The lounge has lots of food during afternoon tea & cocktail section. But the option is limited in the lounge for breakfast. However, the main buffet for breakfast is excellent with lots of choice. The gym has lots of facilities and enjoy the boxing session with Satria.
Beautiful property but needs a do over. A bit tired looking but nevertheless a lovely spot for a destination wedding :)
Magnificent breakfast. We had Mega as our waitress she was so professional and helpful and happy.

Overall a great hotel. Fantastic breakfast, great rooms and nice staff. The pool / private beach space is quite big and it almost feels like paradise. Only 2 issues we encountered during our 1 week stay: -there is a beach club almost inside the hotel but with different management. It‚Äôs great and we went there for lunch on most days but one day they had a crazy party from 3pm to 11 with extremely loud bass that I could hear clearly from my room even with closed windows. -kids. Way too many kids. If you want to relax near the main pool forget about it there will be kids screaming most of the times. If you think you‚Äôre smart and go near the second small pool with no kids, well some families seating near the main pool will decide to go with their kids in this one instead to scream and jump for some reason. I would happily have paid twice what I paid if this was an adult only resort, the kids were annoying to the point we had to go to another hotel pool some days to relax. Either get rid of all kids or put some adult only rules in one of the pools.

Beautiful beach front resort with everything available. Beautiful food, particularly the Italian restaurant was amazing. Staff were very friendly and happy to accommodate any request. We were celebrating our 50th Wedding Anniversary and 70th Birthdays and were greeted with lovely surprise on arrival. Beautiful walks along beach front with lanterns and pretty lights illuminating the beach front. Breakfast was amazing, spoilt for choice, squirrels are entertaining in the trees. Plenty of restaurants to dine at or have a drink, live music and great vibe. Everything you could want and more

I had an amazing experience at Sofitel Nusa Dua. The staff were warm and welcoming, the room was spotless and cozy, and the amenities were excellent. We would also like to make a special mention of an exceptional employee, Panda. His knowledge of Bali, from hidden gems to cultural insights, truly enhanced our trip. Thanks to his thoughtful recommendations, we were able to experience the island in a way we never could have on our own. Panda‚Äôs genuine kindness and enthusiasm made a lasting impression. We will see you again Nusa Dua Sofitel.

Kemarin pesan kamar yg pool access, the best banget kalo bawa anak karna langsung nyemplung ke kolam renang. Disini juga kolam renangnya banyak, ada pool kids juga. Kids club nya juga bagus. Depan pantai, tapi pantainya engga enak buat berenang sih. Tapi oke lah buat main pasir di depannya. Breakfast nya juga enak dan menunya variatif. Overall, highly recommended untuk family vacation.

Excellent Location, Spacious rooms and fantastic Service. Notably Mira at the Cuisine Breakfast restaurant was very helpful, and her attention to detail was very touching we asked if they had a particular tropical fruit that was not on the buffet. She ensured every day we had that fruit at our table. Also want to mention Ardi part of the wedding team from Sofitel he has been very helpful and informative and so so patient. We have been very impressed with the staff and service they have provided.

We stayed at the Sofitel Nusa Dua in a one-bedroom villa with a plunge pool to celebrate our wedding anniversary and it was an unforgettable experience. The private pool villa was amazing, offering the perfect blend of comfort and privacy. From the moment we arrived, we were warmly welcomed by the staff. The room was spacious and comfortable. The hotel facilities were excellent, and having direct access to the beach. The food was great‚Äîevery meal was a treat for the senses. We truly had an incredible stay and can‚Äôt wait to return in the future. Highly recommended!
Everything was magical! Staff were extremely receptive and proactive to making our stay as comparable and luxurious as possible. Highly recommend and will go again in a heartbeat!

As an Accor Platinum member, we were absolutely looked after from check in to check out. The resort is impressive with ample facilities and a short walk to the beach. I was there to celebrate my birthday so my room was decorated on arrival. Room service was great and we couldn‚Äôt fault the customer service. Even on the last day, they moved me into a different room so that we could enjoy the late checkout - thank you so much!

The place has a good beach and friendly staff. They give welcome drinks, bracelets, and flowers. Kids club is not free, compared to other hotels where ypu get 4 hours free. Very comfy bed amd pillows. The drain in the shower was not grading properly so the water overflows through the bathroom and bedroom. The massage at the gazebo near the beach was a great idea and they give good service. The luxury rooms are big enough for family.

I just can't think of anything negative to say. The wonderful standards of this hotel are only surpassed by the staff. We had a suburb room with pool access that was cleaned twice a day. (I didn't think we were that dirty). As suggested by the name the hotel is right on the beach and has a number of different bars and restaurants on site.
